Barcodes in the real world is a magic circle that transmit the magical power from the real world to 'Barcodia'.
The barcodes around you will become your army.
Summon various units and items, and make the strongest army.
Share good barcodes and fight against the monsters with your friends.

title: Legendary Wars
summary: Legendary Wars is a mobile strategy game set in the fantasy world of Legendaria, where players command armies of heroes like Elven Archers, Golems, and Magical Unicorns. The game combines Real-Time Strategy, Tower Defense, and RPG elements. Players battle against monsters and bosses, upgrading heroes and using strategic gameplay to defend castles and progress through various game modes.

title: The War of Eustrath
summary: A turn-based strategy RPG developed by iQubi and available for iPhone and iPad. You control Lucas, Tiana, and a squad of other GEAR (which are essentially mechs) pilots in their fight against the Kradionese forces for control of the world of Eustrath.

title: Pinball Arcade Plus
summary: Pinball Arcade is the most realistic and comprehensive pinball simulation ever created!

title: Frontline: Assault Corps WW2
summary: A World War II Turn-based Tactical Wargame crafted with passion and care for history and strategy enthusiasts alike.

title: Paws and Whiskers
summary: A Clever Blend of Rucksack Management & Auto-Chess Battles! Dive into a light roguelite where tactical pack organisation meets addictive auto-battling!

title: Restoring the Past
summary: Restore ancient artifacts in the company of a cat!

title: Dimension Escape
summary: Dimension Escape is a tactical card game. Choose your heroes wisely—will you pick a ninja pirate or a robo dinosaur? Equip them with powerful ability cards and defeat all who stand in your way.

title: HyperFlight
summary: In this arcade-style space shooter, grab star fragments, powerups, and fuel drums as you fly through space dodging asteroids and trying to get a high score.

title: Exit The Abyss
summary: Exit the Abyss is a psychological horror game where you are trapped in an abandoned, haunted hospital. The game focuses on an oppressive atmosphere, exploration, and mysteries, with minimalist puzzle elements. Immerse yourself in a distorted reality, confront your fears, and find the way out!

title: Spirit Channel
summary: An indie horror game made by ThundyVT who began making this game in Dec 2024. In this game, you try to survive from a monster trying to murder you. The way to get out is by entering the digits for the code.

title: Gooing Up!
summary: A brutally difficult rocket-jumping precision platformer with a charming aesthetic and a non-linear map.

title: Spectrum Siege
summary: Master the art of strategy in Spectrum Siege, a vibrant turn-based game of grid domination. Jump, capture, and outmaneuver your opponents on a dynamic board.

title: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter
summary: A remake of the first installment in the main Trails series, serving as the beginning to the Liberl arc and the series as a whole. The game follows protagonists Estelle Bright and her adopted brother Joshua, who journey through the country of Liberl to train to become senior Bracers, members of a non-government multinational organization that acts to keep the peace and protect civilians.

title: Evil Mountains
summary: Evil mountains is an open world survival game that combines aliens, horror, crafting and base building. You are trying to find a girl that has joined an alien-worshipping cult and gone missing somewhere in the Himalayan mountains. Soon you'll discover that aliens are real, and you are their prey

title: Dream Life in the Country Side
summary: A laid-back farming simulator where you play as Lisa, a dedicated farmer by day and a passionate partner of Honoka at night. Work the land, raise animals, and cultivate your relationship. Unlock special scenes as your bond and farm flourish.

title: Muffles' Life Sentence
summary: Take back your identity in Muffles’ Life Sentence- a darkly quirky RPG set in a prison where inmates are remade to match their crimes.

title: Lords of Ravage
summary: Become the Final Boss! Play any way you want, combine followers from different factions, and win spectacular turn-based battles. Expand your Empire of Darkness and seek a powerful artifact that can change the fate of the world.

title: Too Small To Matter
summary: Journey of animals trying to survive a War. An emotional tale where you'll decide the fate of all who embark on this journey.

title: DashFire
summary: A fast-paced arena-style shooter with an emphasis on movement, collect various weapons, and other pickups to dominate the competition in a peer-to-peer 8-person free-for-all!

title: Static Paradox
summary: Your sight is limited in this first-person psychological horror game in the deep abyss. Use sound to your advantage, while you still have your mind in this experience of pure mind-numbing terror. Try to survive long enough to discover the terrible secrets... if you can...

title: Zombieville USA 3D
summary: Welcome back to Zombieville, where arcade survival action and hilarious stylized visuals combine to eat your brains! Choose your weapons, grab a friend, and blast your way through the endless hordes!

title: Colors of the Past
summary: Soo-ji is pulled back into her past through haunting melodies and unsaid words. As she uncovers hidden truths, she must face her trauma and decide whether to find redemption or let go forever.

title: Stranded With Darkness
summary: From an Indie developer in Sweden we bring you Stranded With Darkness. A base building tower-defense like game, with up to 4 player online CO-OP. Stranded on a desert like planet, gather resources during the day, defend the SOS transmitter during the night. Survive as many days as possible.

title: Rebel Tank Solo-Raid
summary: Top-down extraction shooter, where you play as a tank tasked with raiding a military outpost filled with landmines to loot Nuclear Nukes and deliver it at the extraction point.

title: Fluffy Sailors
summary: Fluffy Sailors is a charming action-roguelite where you fight in thrilling real-time sea battles between adorable animal pirates. Fire them at your enemies, capture their ships, and fulfill Her Majesty's royal mission!

title: Pixel Pirates
summary:
Pixel Pirates is an action-adventure game where you'll take on the role of the reluctant hero, James Flint.

The cursed Captain Blackwood has unleashed chaos in his pursuit for power, and it’s up to you to rise to stop him. Battle creatures and fearsome pirates on land and sea, explore and uncover secrets across handcrafted islands, collect unique items, seek treasure, and embark on a thrilling quest to save the world — all in this byte-sized, swashbuckling adventure.

This game is currently in Early Access and is actively in development.

title: King's Beat
summary: Survive obstacles on varying neon space boards that move in rhythm. Battle an onslaught of chess-inspired enemies moving on changing beats. Solve puzzles that make you control the beat. This mix of rhythm, chess, puzzle and endless runner will test your fingers, quick thinking and patience.

title: Octopus Goulash
summary: Explore a futuristic metropolis, interact with a population of NPCs, and experience a unique narrative. Engage in dynamic missions, battle between flying cars, and shape your story in this interactive world where every choice is an opportunity, every moment an unparalleled adventure!

title: Wasteland Rangers
summary: Wasteland Rangers is a fast-paced first-person shooter where you fight for survival in post-apocalyptic wastelands. Choose from four unique classes, battle across diverse locations, and prove you're the best ranger!

title: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2025
summary: Lead your college basketball team in Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2025. Recruit stars, coach for success, and make key decisions that will lead your team to the tournament. Navigate recruiting, the transfer portal and NIL options to build a winner. The ultimate coaching simulation game!

title: Crystal: Automaton
summary: A short automation challenge aimed at everyone from beginner to veteran. Take your time to uncover the lore of an ancient civilization without any dangers. Can you find a clever way to use logistics to overcome the scarce space available?

title: Countryside Legends
summary: Peaceful racing in a stylized countryside world awaits you, offering relaxing drives with six unique cars. Enjoy the serene atmosphere, explore scenic tracks, and compete against AI at your own pace.

title: Gamma Zero
summary: The earth is being attacked by creatures from deep space! Time to bring the fight back to them! Battle through multiple stages of heart pounding bullet hell action. Evade the onslaught of bullets, rack up massive multipliers, and get revenge for your planet!

title: Stick Tongue
summary: Hello, I'm Frogus! Humans have ruined the Earth and depleted its resources. My plan? Climb to heaven with my tongue and ask God to make it rain!

title: Puzzle Paradise
summary: Embark on an exciting adventure where you will have to investigate the mysterious disappearance of a local resident. Use your powers of observation and logical thinking to solve a variety of puzzles, collect clues and reconstruct the events.

title: The Other Side
summary: Embark on a chilling co-op adventure in The Other Side, an action packed horror experience. Customize your gear, strategize with friends, and uncover paranormal mysteries. Are you prepared to face the unknown together in this immersive supernatural experience?

title: Operation Blackout
summary: Operation Blackout is an atmospheric first-person shooter where you venture into an abandoned industrial facility to eliminate unknown monsters. Use your skills, scavenge for weapons and supplies, and uncover the secrets lurking in the shadows of this dark place.

title: Smack Monkey
summary: Monkey climb. Monkey fall. Monkey climb.

title: Macro Data Refinement Simulator: Shapes
summary: The game is a Macro Data Refinement terminal simulator with installed a puzzle game - Shapes. This is the favorite game of the assistant director of the Macro Data Refinement Department, in which the goal is to arrange successive layers of the same shapes. Will you be able to beat Miss H's record?

title: Stellar Shapers
summary: Survive in space in this action roguelike with RPG elements where you use your strategy to combine design, weapons and passive skills, shaping your ship in your style, facing increasingly powerful enemies.

title: Myrmidon
summary: Invite a friend online and embark on a puzzle-platformer adventure exploring the bond between an animator and his puppet. Work together to clear obstacles across the sprawling sets of a stop-motion animation workshop and find out to what lengths the power of imagination can take you.

title: Into Death and Beyond
summary: Into Death and Beyond is a gripping first-person survival horror game set on the hostile planet XB32-ENT. As bounty hunter Mark Helkins, scavenge for resources, solve puzzles, and confront terrifying mutants. Unravel dark secrets and capture a rogue alien before it hunts you down. Will you survive?

title: Axios Football
summary: Become the manager of a professional soccer team and lead it to the championship! Show patience and high skills to make your team legendary!

title: Material Evidence
summary: Clean up the streets in this hard-hitting action platformer! Enter a gritty saga of three complex individuals, each driven by their own motives and vices, their paths intersecting in unexpected and violent ways.

title: Pig & Chikin
summary: This is the tale of Pig & Chikin. In a world where pigs have wings, Pig loses her wings in an accident. Her dear friend, Chikin, takes her on a journey to learn to fly again. On the way, they meet magical places and creatures who offer insights into companionship, community, and acceptance.

title: Casino Heist: Escape Room
summary: You've just planned your next heist, the casino owned by the ruthless man who betrayed your mentor. As an experienced thief, solve puzzles and find clues to crack the advanced security systems. Will you be able to open the vault?

title: Dice People
summary: Dice People is an incremental game about rolling dice, creating a mass of units, smashing enemies, and gathering resources to get upgrades in a big skilltree.

title: Countryballs Conquest
summary: Lead your country through the Victorian age, expand your empire as you go head to head with the great powers of the world.

title: Undergoes
summary: Undergoes is a stylized survival horror game where players navigate a drill ship through procedurally generated mines, gather resources, craft tools, and build bases while fending off dangerous enemies.

title: Lab Sorters
summary: Lab Sorters is a cooperative game with local multiplayer for 1-4 players. In this game, you need to search and collect items according to samples in a small location within three minutes to score as many points as possible. You can compete or work together for the best result.

title: Freeforce Airplanes
summary: Freeforce Airplanes is a dynamic air racing game where you control airplanes, fight with opponents and strive for victory at incredible speeds. Choose from 10 unique planes, customize them with a variety of skins and conquer 8 exciting locations!

title: Track Masters Pro
summary: Track Masters Pro is a competitive racing game focused on precision driving and adaptive AI opponents. Players race through a variety of tracks with customizable vehicles, aiming to master each circuit and climb the leaderboard. The game emphasizes realistic handling, time trial challenges, and progression through skill-based performance.

title: Velocity Rush
summary: Velocity Rush is a fast-paced racing game with breathtaking speeds and a stylish visual design. Challenge yourself by competing against smart opponents, choose one of six unique cars and start your ride filled with vibrant colors and adrenaline.

title: Hidden Cats: City
summary: Go on a short but sweet adventure into the black and white world of an urban area! Enjoy the search for cats and recreate a colorful picture. 150 cute cats are waiting for you! Play and relax!

title: Lost Lullabies: The Orphanage Chronicles
summary: "Lost Lullabies - The Orphanage Chronicles" is a Co-Op horror game set in 1980, inspired by the real stories of an orphanage ruined by a fire in 1960 Lowell. Playable with 1-4 players, the goal is to identify and expel malevolent spirits alone or with your team.

title: Vermin Control
summary: In Vermin Control, you will enter a thrilling sci-fi tower defense world filled with strategic combat and high tension. Operate a versatile unit capable of both melee combat and construction, deploy and manage 9 unique devices, and protect key facilities from relentless vermin assaults.

title: Scarlet City of Devils
summary: A demon punk hack and slash adventure game! Explore the city of Elovelle at your own discretion and take down the toughest thugs this game has to offer.

title: Bark Tank
summary: This game is a multiplayer online tank shooting game. The game has a team battle mode. Players eliminate enemy tanks through cooperation and flexible positioning. Only the side that survives in the midst of gunfire and kills all enemy players' tanks will win.

title: EroHPuzzle
summary: EroHPuzzle is an anime picture puzzle game with unique photos. Connect the right pieces to move to the next level. Connect the pieces correctly and you will be relieved

title: So Fart Away
summary: Help Linguini, our hero, escape from a stinky trap using only your FARTS! Avoid farting on others and uncover the wild mechanics of your farts by solving simple and challenging puzzles in this comedic sokoban game! Think twice before you fart!

title: Learn Japanese Kana & Vocab with Sushi
summary: Learn Japanese With Sushi is a edutainment game that teaches Japanese through sushi-themed mini-games. Practice katakana, hiragana, and vocabulary—including kanji—by matching, typing, and sorting sushi. Unlock new words via gachapon, customize JLPT levels (N5-N3), and enjoy a pixel-art sushi bar!

title: Chaos Machina
summary: A fast-paced action RPG dungeon crawler with roguelike elements. Shoot, run, dodge, and upgrade your abilities to defeat enemies before Chaos consumes the level.

title: Zombots: Invasion
summary: Zombots is a fast-paced, wave-based survival FPS where players will have to utilize unique weapons, powerful upgrades, and exciting abilities to fend off hordes of invading robot zombies!

title: Little Adventure Tale
summary: Little Adventure tale is a Roguelike Deckbuilder set in a cute fantasy world where you can enlist the help of the Guild to Hire companions and manage several Card Decks & Accept Quests to earn more rewards! All this in order to banish the Evil Lord Obradin!

title: Golden Knight
summary: Defeat the forces of darkness and bring peace back to the kingdom of Valerond in this action-packed mini metroidvania.

title: Yoshima: Hentai Simulator
summary: Yoshima: Hentai Simulator is a 2D game with a lot of mechanics. It is always exhausting to look for apartment, but fortune is at your side now! Welcome your new roommate, Yoshima! Can you find the key to her heart? Don't forget to pay the rent!

title: Bolide
summary: Bolide is an arcade roguelike where you survive waves in space to unlock new skills! Destroy rocks and survive challenging waves to earn skill points and use them to choose from a variety of skills. Pick from 40+ skills, allowing you to create lots of skill combinations!

title: Cyrano
summary: Write love letters and cross swords in a one hour adaptation of the classic play: Cyrano de Bergerac!

title: Exosky
summary: ExoSky: Join a whimsical AI cat in a futuristic flight sim. Master stunts in a tech-inspired world with moddable aircraft and realistic physics. Explore beyond Earth in a blend of simulation and imagination. A pilot's dream of skill and creativity.

title: Scrap Collector
summary: In Scrap Collector collect, combine, and automate card production. Make your robot empire and take on the enemies of the overgrown and mutated earth.

title: Braise
summary: Dive into the fantasy world of Braise, a narrative adventure game. Explore the Dragon’s Valley and complete quests and puzzles to uncover the mysteries it holds.

title: Nubby's Number Factory
summary: A plinko-style roguelike where you work at a number factory. Launch your spherical friend, Nubby, down a pegboard to make bigger and bigger numbers! But beware, if you fail to meet your number quota, the sun will explode.

title: RPG Quiz
summary: It's a quiz game with RPG/Roguelike aspects. Enemies can blind, stun and even confuse you using your own tactics against you! You will be answering randomly selected questions, defeating each foe and learning class skills along the way!

title: Crimsonwood
summary: Crimsonwood is a roguelike top-down shooter in a cursed national park. Collect various weapons, gain perks and battle hordes of enemies to survive. Play solo or online co-op.

title: Tennis Life
summary: This is a tennis-themed open-world game. From managing or joining a tennis club to every swing and movement on the court, you have full control.

title: Railway Chai Wala
summary: Step into the world of Ramu, a spirited railway chaiwala at the bustling Fakripur station. Life isn’t just about brewing chai—it’s steeped in mystery! Uncover dark, masala-filled secrets in this Psychological Thriller Game with a blend of suspense and Indian flavor!

title: Phoenix 2
summary: A fast-paced shoot 'em up where skill matters. Master over 100 ships, unleash powerful special abilities, and blast through waves of Invaders. Play a new mission every day and climb the world-wide leaderboards.

title: Alter Age
summary:
Embark on an unforgettable adventure with a party whose ages change!

Arga has been training daily to prove himself superior to his father, who holds the title of the strongest man in the world. During this process, he awakened the job "Soul Alter," a unique skill that changes the states of himself and his companions between adult and child. Sometimes a young man, sometimes a boy, he faces great trials with his companions.

Alter your team in turn-based battles between adult and child states to alternate between attack or support types! Utilize a wide range of formations and elements, including equipment and passive skills, to strategically navigate battles.

Explore a vast expanding world depicted in beautiful pixels, from puzzle dungeons to detour dungeons! Collect ingredients while walking around to cook meals, take on special quests limited to the child state, and fully enjoy every corner of the world of Alter Age!

title: Saihate Station
summary: An exploration/horror/adventure game about the codependent, love-hate relationship between two men.

title: UwU Hunter
summary: Jump and shoot your way through challenging levels, battle formidable bosses, and unlock all the UwUs to win the heart of your Catgirl. Explore the Gallery to enjoy all the UwUs you've collected.

title: Realmweaver
summary: Realmweaver is an Isometric grid-based puzzle game that tests both your puzzle solving and timing skills with a unique set of puzzles and mechanics to master and overcome!

title: Tetradome
summary: A non-linear puzzle adventure game with 3D pixel art visuals, containing mechanical, logical, and environmental puzzles themed in a fantasy scene. Unravel the enigmas of the four elements of nature so you can free yourself from the dome!

title: Big Burger Store
summary: Big Burger Store is a 2D top down cooking game where you push around giant food items and serve burger orders to customers. Explore the busy world outside of work and participate in activities such as going fishing, fighting monsters, gambling, and so much more!

title: Finnish Cottage 8
summary: You've been trapped in a looping Finnish summer cottage. Use your observation and memory to find anomalies and make the right choice to escape the Finnish Cottage 8.

title: Check & Clean
summary: Check&Clean is a tactical First Person Shooter that immerses you in a rhythmic universe, alternating analysis sequences and gunfights.

title: I Am Legion: Stand Survivors
summary: Summon your stands and brawl it out! Dive into the thrill of mowing down enemies, synthesizing and upgrading, mining, forging gear, unlocking new characters and equipment. Discover unique stands combos and craft your own battle style to break through the chaos!

title: Happy Poker
summary: Pure original storyline and new gameplay, featuring 14 unique heroes, 54 playing cards, over 100 Elf Hearts, and over 100 selectable cards, creating a unique fast gaming experience with only three to five minutes. More heroes, skills, and cards are still expanding

title: Poofie Plays God
summary: Poofie Plays God is an Indie Open world Puzzle game where you'll have to lower the curse binding you in the forest and escape before he or the others kill you.

title: End's Reach
summary: End's Reach is a 3D Exploration Action Adventure Game that focuses on a character lost in the depths of space. Players will solve puzzles, collect upgrades, items, weapons and even magical abilities as they uncover the mysteries of this strange new world. A classic tale of technology taken too far.

title: StrikeNet
summary: A fast-paced, dynamic PvP shooter. Choose your strategy with a variety of weapons and dive into multiple game modes! Team up with friends or battle against others! Use buffs like shields, speed, super jumps and invisibility to dominate the battlefield!

title: Nuclear Cheetah
summary:
Bounce, pounce, and slide your way through fast-paced levels as Chaz, the radioactive cheetah! This retro platformer inspired by the likes of Sonic the Hedgehog and Jazz Jackrabbit features a high skill ceiling, crispy pixel art, and a bangin’ MIDI-styled soundtrack.

Nuclear Cheetah combines time attack platforming with a collect-a-thon progression system. Play through and master challenging stages, earn power orbs to unlock new areas of the castle, and save the princess; all while uncovering the story of how a once mild-mannered cheetah transformed into a green gangsta who eats toxic waste for breakfast.

title: The Little World
summary: The Little World is a strategy-based tactical game featuring random campaigns, story maps, custom game maps, and custom character creation, with support for multiplayer battles and cooperation.

title: Dimension Warrior
summary: Dimension Warrior is an intense soulslike action adventure game in which you traverse various dimensions, facing powerful enemies in your quest to complete your dangerous mission and return to your own world. The core of the gameplay revolves around defeating powerful bosses.

title: TurtleRun
summary: Slow and steady? Not this turtle! Leap, dodge, shoot, and parry your way back through this mysterious land to reunite with your beloved home.This fast-paced platformer is packed with tricky platforming levels, engaging mini-games, intense boss fights, and a determined turtle on a mission.

title: My Virtual Friend
summary: My Virtual Friend is a desktop pet/idler game where a cute girl accompanies you whilst you navigate your computer. She's interested in what you're doing and will do her best to cheer you up! Play with her, unlock new backgrounds, and customize your outfits. Just don't make her mad...

title: Mewseum: Masterpieces
summary: Mewseum: Masterpieces is a shikaku-style puzzle game where each solved grid reveals part of a great masterpiece. Solve hundreds of puzzles and discover unique paintings in the latest art exhibition of the feline world!

title: Hentai World Slice
summary: This arcade game lets players slice fruits with a mouse on a PC. Move the cursor to cut fruits and earn points. The goal is to slice as many as possible for a high score.

title: Alex Hill: Whispers at White Oak Inn
summary: Ever since a young woman died near the White Oak Inn, strange things have been happening. Now, her spirit roams the inn, and an employee is receiving strange letters. What dark secrets wait to be found? The clock is ticking and you, as Alex Hill, must uncover the truth before it’s too late.

title: The Night of Escape
summary: The Night of Escape" is an indie game personally crafted with themes of fear, escape, and decryption. Players take on the role of an escapee, constantly dodging danger and utilizing clues found to survive and flee. The game adopts a first-person perspective, immersing you in the experience.

title: Ethereal Abyss
summary: Ethereal Abyss is a single-player third-person shooter with psychological horror elements, inspired by the Backrooms. Navigate multi-dimensional levels, solve puzzles with time-inversion mechanic, while resisting enslavement by your mind.

title: Food Fight Fiesta: Multi-Use Cards
summary: Multi-Use Cards: Eat Food to Heal, Throw them to Attack. No more dead hands! Start with 8 cards and battle through 13 challenging levels. Collect and combine over 200 unique cards to create thousands of powerful builds.

title: Unnamed Arcade
summary: The game is a creative 3rd person shooter / platformer, where players can earn rewards by completing challenges, or craft their own in game rewards by creating challenges for other players.

title: Oratorio
summary:
Oratorio is a rhythm action rail-shooter developed for the 8-bit Nintendo Entertainment System.

Primarily inspired by games like Rez, Child of Eden, and Thumper. Oratorio is a unique on-rails rhythmic shooter where players create the music of the game through interaction with the game's systems, like shooting enemies, projectiles, and powerups. Everything players do contributes to the soundscape in this innovative retro music shooting game.

The game takes place in a dystopian cyberpunk future where an environmentalist hacker group launches a desperate mission to hack the servers of one of the world's largest corporations in order to steal the DNA sequences for extinct plants and animals that the corporation has copyrighted for use in virtual reality safaris. As the enigmatic hacker named Oratorio, players are the last hope for revival in a world that has gone to a digital ruin.

Players control a cursor and assume a first-person perspective on an ever-expanding digital track in cyberspace.

title: Desktop Cat Cafe
summary: Build your dream cat cafe in this tiny cozy management sim that lives at the bottom of your screen! Unlock exciting new recipes, decorate your space with our wide variety of goodies, and hire cute staff to take care of the cafe while you're doing other things.

title: Harder
summary: Harder is an action rogue-like game with combat heavily inspired by the hack and slash genre. Progress through a series of enemies and bosses to reach your one true goal. Dodge, dash, parry, and slash your way through angels and demons alike in this quest to kill GOD.

title: Magical Girl Konoha
summary: To aid the King, Priestess Konoha plunges into "Grimoire"! The world inside "Grimoire" is formed by another world called Grimoire Land in which Konoha becomes a magical girl, and has come to save the world!

title: Dead Beats Survivors
summary: A 2D shooting survivor game! Survive in a dark, zombie-infested underground disco and earn money!

title: 100 Dogs in India
summary: Find 100 dogs in India! A simple hidden object game made with Kivy. Do you recognize the real-life buildings in the background?

title: OmOneko
summary: “A story about cat girls … with bite.” Nekos have evolved in the shadows of human society. Beautiful. Mysterious. Chaotic. And now, three of them live with you. Will you be able to get past the stigma and grow closer to them? OmOneko is a tale of cat and mouse... and rats.

title: Ladies I'm Ready
summary: The player becomes Samuel, uses the first-person perspective to immerse himself in meeting two beauties, and embarks on a joyful and sweet love journey with them. Two girls with different personalities, and it is up to you to decide who will go to the end with you.

title: The Last Tape
summary: A hidden truth. For over 50 years, Lurmont has been hiding incredibly dark secrets from the public. During an investigation, tapes are discovered showing all the atrocities they have committed.

title: Jar
summary: Jar is a clicker game, wait for the balls to fill the whole jar and click on it to make new balls appear.

title: Milky Way Idle
summary: A multiplayer idle RPG where automation replaces grinding. Level up skills, gather resources, craft powerful items, and battle monsters—all while AFK. Trade in the marketplace, join a guild, team up for party combat, and socialize in chat as you progress effortlessly.

title: Cyber Revolution
summary: Cyber Revolution is a third-person shooter where you venture into a distant star system to stop an alien invasion. Fight for survival, collect energy from special boxes to destroy your foes. Get ready for fast-paced combat and the unique atmosphere of a futuristic war!

title: Same Room Same Day
summary: Step into the mind of Rosaline in this psychological horror FPS. Face terrifying manifestations of her fears, battle through intense combat, and help her find inner peace. Solve puzzles along the way to unlock deeper layers of her psyche and bring her closer to healing

title: A Short Death
summary: A short 3D Platformer and Collectathon situated in Hell. Play as a humble cat (with wings!) and get to the top of the mysterious tower!

title: Warm Monkey
summary: Warm Monkey is an Action/Platformer video game in isometric 3D landscape. In a modern architectural and exotic city, a monkey multiplies and its need for water increases. He must reach the seashore.

title: Mercenary Squad Auto Chess
summary: A light Roguelike auto chess game that combines dark treasure hunting gameplay. Different professions can be paired with various skills, equipment can be collected, attributes can be refined, and powerful teams can be created by enhancing skills with runes.

title: Hook Line and Sniper
summary: You are a fish. Armed with your grappling hook-equipped sniper rifle, go on the ultimate krilling spree in Hook Line & Sniper! In this fast-paced arcade shooter, rack up points by mastering your arsenal and maximizing your style.

title: Snow Rider 3D
summary: Snow Rider 3D takes snowboarding to the next level! Master your skills as you race down picturesque mountains, perform tricks, and unlock new gear. The immersive experience and stunning graphics will keep you coming back for more. Are you ready to conquer the slopes?

title: Imvi: Echoes of Harmony
summary: Imvi: Echoes of Harmony is a third-person experience where you use the attractive and repulsive forces of black and white singularities to explore an ancient alien civilization to recover your lost memories.

title: Through the Edges
summary:
Step into a world divided by the enigmatic Spheres, where different races live under strict balance – a balance that has never been questioned… until now.

As the protagonist, an ordinary young person from a remote village, you receive an unexpected invitation to a grand ball. What seems like a stroke of fate soon turns into a revelation of hidden anomalies, ancient powers, and a secret that could shatter reality itself.

But you are not alone.

Meet intriguing characters from various races, each carrying their own secrets, struggles, and desires. Will they become your allies, rivals, or something more? Your choices will shape their destinies – and your own.

title: O.W.L Projekt 2
summary: Guide a young being’s daring adventure as you puzzle your way through diorama-style landscapes!

title: Rabbit Trail
summary: Wake up in a magical forest... as a rabbit. Something strange has happened to you, and solving it won’t be easy. Explore fascinating worlds, face challenging puzzles, and unravel the mystery of how you lost your human form. Each jump brings you closer to the truth... Are you ready to discover it?

title: Isle Frontier
summary: Isle Frontier is an isometric point-and-click life simulator where you can build a homestead on your own personal island. Live on your own by utilizing your vast array of skills, such as fishing, hunting, cooking, crafting, and more.

title: Wordfright
summary: A reimagining of the classic 'Hangman' game turned into a horrific thrill ride.

title: Control Room
summary: The game is a simple 2D platform action game with roguelite elements.You play a game in a certain room. You can avoid enemies from all around you and survive for 5 minutes to clear the game. You have to control various events, and every time you start the game you will discover something new.

title: These Darker Tides
summary: Welcome [EMPLOYEE] to your new job protecting Deep Sea Cables from creatures of the deep. We're not liable for loss of limbs, sanity, or life while on the job. Don't forget to keep your desk clean and your eyes on those cameras!

title: Mars Vice
summary: Mars Vice is a narrative adventure game set on a distant and futuristic Mars. Follow two civil investigators, Dax and Anaya, as they root out deep-seated corruption in the Martian city of Pavonis in this biopunk-infused story.

title: Memory Lost
summary: MemoryLost is an action shooter, the battles in which are built around the mechanics of mind capturing and moving into the enemy's body. First-aid kits were not delivered, there is only one clip in the weapon - change the bodies to survive!

title: RewindGirl
summary: Running, jumping, rewinding— A time-leap action puzzle where you cooperate with your past self!

title: Book Bound
summary: Book Bound is a cozy bookshop simulation game. Use a range of items to decorate your shop and make it truly yours. Pick the books you would like to sell. Help customers find books they want most. Sell books in different genres.

title: Dwarfs Delight
summary: Join the adventure of Dwarfs Delight, an explosive multiplayer game where dwarves battle in a tavern for glory and beer! Face off against your friends in this couch game, where every mug counts. Get ready for laughter and unforgettable moments. Ideal for nights with friends!

title: Prophecrawl
summary: In this dystopian nightmare, soldiers track the Anomaly—a shape-shifting enigma that clones itself, warps reality, and mimics human speech. Communicate with your squad, queue up for online missions, but remember: it’s not just a hunt; it’s a frantic race against time.

title: Circuit Maze
summary: Tower defense without combat. Circuit Maze is a puzzle game where you need to build the longest possible maze with the resources you are given.

title: Shtrek
summary: Shtrek is a simple but challenging platformer where every move matters. You have 60 levels to beat and 60 lives to do it. No extra mechanics, no distractions - just precise jumps, fast resets, and pure platforming.

title: Proud Dad Simulator
summary: Have you ever wondered what it feels like to have a proud and supportive dad? Proud Dad Simulator gives you the loving father you wish you had growing up! Simply click dad to receive an affirmation, or delve deeper to explore all 10 minigames and collect all achievements.

title: Moonbase Lambda
summary: Moonbase Lambda is a horror survival game which you have to escape from a procedurally-generated maze. The premise of the game is that an unidentified creature breaks into the moonbase, which leaves you no choice but to survive and escape from it.

title: EvoWars: New Era
summary: EvoWars: New Era is a competitive multiplayer open-arena game where a single hit means defeat and your power is determined by your wits and size… Easy to learn, hard to master. For daredevils only!

title: Slime Heroes
summary: A game where the slimes are finally the heroes. Play together with your friends as adorable slimes - the only creature that can save the world from an evil corruption. Find different weapons and create your own unique magic abilities to express the way you want to adventure.

title: FP Racer
summary: A short solo racing experience in a minimalistic setting.

title: Backrooms: The Lost Circus
summary: Backrooms: The Lost Circus is a Co-op horror game up to 4 players, where you and your friends will explore the game, try to pass the game level using your mind, wit, remembering the places where you were

title: Cosmic Arcade Tycoon
summary: Welcome to Cosmic Arcade Tycoon! Build your own Arcade in this tiny, cozy and casual sci-fi simulation! Unlock new objects, customize your layout and welcome cute alien visitors to create a flourishing entertainment hub!

title: Raise Your Tribe
summary: RAISE YOU TRIBE and fight against Robots or other Survivors. Explore, Craft, Build and Survive in a deadly post-nuclear war island where artificial intelligence has defeated humanity. Start from scratch and end up as the leader of Island!

title: Poltergeist Prodigy
summary:
Poltergeist Prodigy is a single-player, story-focused, puzzle action-adventure game, a first person haunter where you delight in being a mischievous ghost.

You are a new ghost, and to continue existing and uncover how you died you must haunt the living. With guidance from a comedic, more experienced ghost, you will learn to haunt people and animals with a variety of techniques in a range of places. By throwing objects around, conjuring scary aspects, possessing people, and ultilising many more haunting abilities, you will scare your way to becoming a more powerful spirit and trigger memories of how you died and the mysterious circumstances behind it.

title: Leas: City of the Sun
summary: When a new magic is discovered, it's up to you to unravel the mystery. Find answers from fae and humans, save your city, and maybe even fall in love.

title: Toska
summary: TOSKA is a short 2D psychological horror game with visual novel, point-and-click, and choice-based elements to influence your play. Play as Miro Demko, as he experiences the horror of his very own dreams.

title: Rogue Conflict
summary: Rogue Conflict is a turn-based strategy roguelike. Combining tactical wargame combat with procedural roguelike features, Rogue Conflict is a game made for both wargamers and general turn based game enthusiasts alike.

title: HalfMoon Adventures
summary: You own a store for weekend adventurers and mainly sell maps of dungeons. You sell maps during the day and crawl through dungeons at night. However - the market for map sellers is in high demand.Try to offer the best maps and push your competitor out of the market!

title: Dead of Night: Supermarket
summary: Experience the dread of a midnight shift in a quiet supermarket. As mundane tasks blur with eerie events, discover that the darkness hides more than just silence.

title: Daily Driven Racer
summary: DDR is about racing everyday cars, or sleeper cars, on unique tracks, each offering a fresh experience. Enjoy various game modes in Single Player and Split Screen. The Simcade driving style ensures fun for both casual and hardcore players. Play with 2-4 players in local split-screen for maximum fun!

title: Jianghu Diary
summary: The game recreates the ever-changing scenes of the ancient martial arts world. Players can experience rich gameplay in the game, such as freely exploring the rivers and lakes, making friends with various heroes and heroes, and challenging various martial arts masters.

title: Max Manos
summary: Max Manos is an incremental destruction game where you play as a powerful hand, known as Max Manos, eliminating shapes. Chain explosive reactions, collect shards, and upgrade your abilities to destroy shapes even faster.

title: Horse Runner DX
summary: Horse Runner DX is a wholesome, fast-paced platformer with a twist: You play a whole herd of horses! Combine different horses and power-ups, complete increasingly difficult challenges, chase new highscores and enjoy the ride from cute to chaotic fun.

title: Head Over Heels: Deluxe
summary: Join Head and Heels (pun intended) to defeat the Emperor in this award-winning vintage gem remake that plays (and looks!) better than ever before.

title: Balloon Friends
summary: This is a mini puzzle game of cooperative puzzle-solving abilities that may test the emotional strength of the relationship between friends/partners, which requires you and your teammate to cooperate and let the Balloon Friends find the way to the end by conducting the gas!

title: The Little Moon
summary: Storytelling, Side-scroller, Universe, Travel, Fishing, Action, Adventure.

title: Hidden Skulls
summary: Immerse yourself in a short but mysterious adventure in a black and white world full of monsters and evil! Explore the map and find 100 cleverly hidden skulls of different creatures and recreate the picture in color. Play and relax if you are not afraid!

title: Hentai Phoebe
summary: Dive into the world of temptations and dark magic with Phoebe and test your skills in this unforgettable puzzle experience!

title: My Life: Zoo Vet
summary: Take care of sick zoo animals!

title: Sentinel Point Heroes
summary: A superhero themed, rogue-like deck-builder where you need to time your moves to counter the villain in turn-based combat. The game features a high level of variability where you can combine power sources and change difficulty settings, or use mods to make it your own.

title: Bao Bao's Cozy Laundromat
summary: Relax in Bao Bao’s Cozy Laundromat, an idle game where you join Bao Bao, a charming panda, in creating the coziest laundromat. Purchase colorful washing machines, add delightful decorations, and hire panda helpers. Watch your cozy laundromat bustle with life, even when you’re not around!

title: Slumbering Feline
summary: Step into the shoes of Momo, who finds herself lost in a strange dream and trying to escape from her slumber.

title: MonsterEnd
summary: As a survivor, although you successfully avoided the invasion of the apocalypse, after several years of life, your resources are about to run out. In order to survive, you have to leave the shelter and face enemies from all directions!

title: Tiny Dangerous Dungeons Remake
summary: Guide Timmy the little treasure hunter through traps and puzzles to reach the legendary treasure. This classic mini metroidvania is remade with new visuals, music, and content.

title: Mystal Haven
summary: Mystal Haven is a laid-back, open-world creature-collecting game with 4-player split-screen and online multiplayer.

title: The Void Chronicles Chronis
summary: Every decision matters. It’s a race against the clock in a story where paranoia, creativity, and courage are your only allies. Will you break the loop, or will time break you?

title: Grab it! Crane Game
summary:
Gear up for an arcade classic: the crane game!
Win as many prizes as you can and become a crane game master!

title: Hunt the Pale Gods
summary: A cosmic horror grid based roguelike deck builder. Fight nightmarish creatures, add cards to your deck, discover powerful curios and combine all their unique effects in game breaking synergies. Awaken and Hunt the Pale Gods.

title: Sombra
summary: Sombra is a 2D platform video game with a pixel art style where you have to guide a cat to the exit of the cave it has fallen into, with the only option of clicking a button to perform different actions.Help this scared little kitty find her way back home.

title: Negative Energy
summary: Negative Energy is a tower defense game with basic RTS mechanics, where your goal is to defend the construction of a Dyson sphere, while fighting against waves of hundreds of enemies ships.

title: Bird Bump
summary: Don't bump into the ledge

title: Code Trainer
summary: Code Trainer is a programming practice tool. Solve coding problems and improve your understanding of computer science. Prior programming experience is required.

title: Dice & Sword
summary: DICE & SWORD is a board game base RPG developed by a solo-indie base in Hong Kong. Let roll the dice to start your adventure!

title: Golden Warden
summary: A turn-based roguelike battle game with easy controls. Choose a card each turn to reach the depths of the dungeon and acquire the treasures guarded by the Golden Warden.

title: Foddia
summary:
Foddia is a 2D-Platformer inspired by Getting Over It. There are difficult challenges to overcome and mysteries to uncover at every turn. Swing on ropes, make long jumps across chasms, and climb your way to the top of the Foddian Mountain.

You came here for a reason.
Was it to climb this mountain that won't stop towering over you?
Was it to search for secrets in the depths unknown?
Was it to become the fastest hiker the world has ever seen?

The only certainty is that if you leave now...
You may never know why you came in the first place.

title: Subzero Stealth
summary: Airdropped into a snowbound village under siege, you’re the lone soldier facing relentless enemies and harsh conditions. Navigate deadly terrain, combat armed foes and destroy critical targets. Master the battlefield where death is ever-present. Will you survive? The challenge awaits.

title: Beamdown
summary: Beamdown is a 3D top-down hack&slash action game featuring fast combat, upgrades, and difficult big bosses. Explore the different planet environments, take down large bosses, upgrade your character, and repeat.

title: Collect Baby Oil
summary: Collect Baby Oil is a fast-paced runner where you have to run away from the police. Collect bottles of baby oil scattered along your path to unlock a variety of funny and unique characters such as Quandale Dingle. Avoid obstacles, time your jumps perfectly, and see how far you can go before the cops catch up.

title: All Aboard! The Train Defense Express
summary: Protect the Infinite Power Generator by looping around the train tracks! Battle endless waves of enemies in this unique hybrid of auto-battler, survivor, tower defense, idle/clicker gameplay. How long can you survive?

title: Gyroban
summary: Spin and shake entire Sokoban-like levels to solve puzzles, avoid obstacles, and interact with unique objects that transform gameplay and add new layers of challenge.

title: PC Jumps
summary: Jump across ramps and dodge obstacles to conquer increasing difficult Levels.

title: Steel Century Groove: Midnight
summary:
Pilot mecha in rhythm-RPG dance battles in this free standalone adventure from the world of Steel Century Groove.

Dance your way through the neon streets of a city where it's always night, challenge rival pilots to burnish your digital reputation, and then delve below the skyscrapers into the ancient ruins of a more dangerous era.

title: Celtic Heroes
summary: Are you looking for that classic MMORPG vibe? Whether you're a minmaxer strategizing every detail for maximum efficiency, a savvy fashion collector in search of the most stunning outfits, or even someone who enjoys the journey of casual leveling, Celtic Heroes opens its gates to you!

title: Broken Time
summary: Broken Time - a world where time no longer matters. This low-polygon action game immerses players in a post-apocalyptic environment where every movement changes the course of events. Fight and gather resources to survive in this madness.

title: Tactical Mission: Target Rush
summary: Tactical Mission: Target Rush is an immersive, single-player tactical FPS where every shot counts. Challenge yourself by chasing high scores as you rush through CQB courses, improving your marksmanship against your own best times.

title: Dogs Contrast
summary: Get ready for an exciting adventure where you will have to find 10 differences between two similar images with cute dogs.??

title: Nebulock
summary: Nebulock is a short bullet-hell game with intense gameplay, where the player must destroy bosses made of blocks, collect resources and upgrade his spaceship.

title: Parasite in Love
summary: Marlowe dreamed of finding a loyal partner who wants to raise a family. She just never thought the first taker would be a brain-eating amoeba. Trapped in a remote cabin, she must fight to stop the parasite in her brain from shutting her off for good.

title: Find 100 Ducks and Blast Them!
summary: In this game, you must blast 100 toy ducks! Relax, take aim, and let the feathers fly! With light-hearted gameplay and cute ducks to hunt, it's a casual first-person experience full of wholesome, family-friendly fun!

title: Ursid
summary: Ursid is a zen puzzle game inspired by the constellations and the beauty of their imaginary pictures. Connect the stars, explore the hidden images, you will gradually reveal an emotional father-son story while counting down to the moment the Ursid Shower appears.

title: Undercover Fools
summary: Infiltrate a secure building, cleverly bypass guards and traps, complete tasks with the help of cool spy gadgets. Play alone or with friends, upgrade your spy skills and plan excellent missions, and most importantly... Don't screw up!

title: OPA: Super Janken
summary: A reimagining of the classic Rock-Paper-Scissors to make it more competitive and engaging. Collect the cards and boost your score by facing increasingly stronger opponents.

title: Flashing Dark
summary: Flashing Dark is a first-person horror game about a lighthouse keeper lately transferred to a new outpost. As he struggles to manage his work, he uncovers a dark and terrifying secret of the island he lives on.

title: Colossal Crisis
summary: Colossal Crisis is a fast-paced 2D hack-and-slash platformer where you play as a brave swordsman fighting to reclaim an island overrun by ruthless enemies and towering giants. Will you rise against the "Colossal Counsel" or fall beneath their might?

title: Hack and Slash Fury
summary: Heavy Metal! Deep Combo System! Lot of Cinematics! Discover Legendary Warriors Forged in War! Destroy the dark empire! and save the world of his tiranity!!! Dark or Light?! Only one will Survive!!! Prepare your sword! And Anihilate all your enemies!

title: Quetzal's Call
summary: Embark on a mystic journey in Quetzal, a fast-paced, bullet hell platformer highly focused on reactive gameplay. You’ll discover a mystical underground world, defeat blood ravenous stone creatures, and survive tortuous obstacles in your quest for answers and meaning.

title: Lost Valley of the Frog King
summary: You are the captain of an arctic expedition. Months into the voyage, you discover an uncharted island, encased in a wall of ice. You decide to take a closer look and meet with your boat on the far side of the island. What will you discover?

title: Car Mechanic Shop Simulator
summary: Car Mechanic Shop Simulator is a simulation game that offers a comprehensive, in-depth experience combining strategic business management with the technical nuances of car maintenance, making it a must download for enthusiasts and novices alike.

title: Potion Shop Simulator
summary: Master the art of alchemy in Potion Shop Simulator, a unique blend of simulation and strategy. Brew potions, manage your shop, and cater to a magical clientele in a single-player or co-op experience of the medieval fantasy world.

title: Write Warz
summary: Dive into Write Warz, where creativity clashes in thrilling story battles! Craft sentences, vote on favorites, and navigate plot twists in diverse themed worlds. Unleash your imagination in this multiplayer creative writing adventure one sentence at a time.

title: Gordon and the Light Within
summary:
Gordon the Corgi adventures through a dark forest full of many dangers his own light the only guide to help recover from the darkness that seeks to consume his love. Can he find his way back? or will the darkness prevail? A platformer with tough challenges and many enemies to defeat. A classic retro style game and even though it can be challenging at times it is definitely a game for casual players looking for the feeling of old arcade type platformers.

Move around and explore the maze of levels as you expand your light source in the darkness. Having to squish enemy squirrels, birds, and cats. With big sub-bosses and bosses that provide a challenge in finding a way to overcome them. Collect items to increase your lives and see if you can get this highest score while avoiding being crushed or falling. Watch out for certain nature items that can slow your character, and manage your health, stamina and lives carefully to make it through the levels.

Simple 2d side scrolling platformer controls using Wasd, arrow keys. or controller. run and jump mechanics (using space bar) and bouncing off enemies heads to crush them while avoiding being crushed.

Chill audio design and hand-drawn backgrounds emphasizing the nature aspects of the forest into which Gordon the Corgi is exploring his way through.

title: Fisher Idle
summary: Start from scratch in the middle of the ocean as a fisherman! Buy bigger boats, upgrade your ships, and build your fishing empire. Remember: more fish means more gold!

title: Floor 0
summary: Immerse yourself in a psychological horror experience presented as unsettling found footage. You are trapped in an endless, dimly lit hallway, with nothing but a flashlight to help you. Starting on floor 10, you have one goal — reach floor 0 and escape.
Let's do some easy math with the girls!

title: Trailblader
summary: Trailblader is a turn-based strategy game that features loop-based combat, integrating 4X strategy and hero development. The game tells the story of a hero who, having lost their homeland, leads the people to migrate to the wilderness to rebuild their home.

title: Hang up Street
summary: Build your vocational academy to turn adventurers into your idle heroes, liven up the deserted streets, and advance the levels together!

title: GawaiiGo
summary: A battle of hiding and seeking, masterful disguises and clever captures—all in《Gawaii Go》!

title: Dirt Bike Mini Racer
summary: It will test your nerves and take you to the extremes offroad dirt bike racing capabilities

title: Totally Defenceless
summary: Totally Defenceless is a wave-based tower defence game. You will need to protect your energy cores from the invading alien bugs by strategically constructing a maze of towers to alter their path to your advantage.

title: A Bad Clicker
summary: Some games are good, a few games are great, most are alright. This is not one of those games. Come explore this labyrinth of menus that make number bigger. Watch number get big, only to get small, to get big again, faster this time even!

title: The Bibites: Digital Life
summary: Explore real digital life in The Bibites! Play god as you guide your bibites on their evolutionary journey. Analyze their Neural Network brains and genetic information as they adapt to their environments. Save your favorites and test their strength in Challenge Mode!

title: Gumballs & Dungeons
summary: This is a mysterious adventure. How long can you survive during the unknown journey? Enter the Gumballs & Dungeons!Start off a great adventure with world wide players,lead your Swordsman,Demon Hunter,Mage and Death Knight to beat the Evil Dominator of the Erathia continent.

title: Hidden Cats: Japan
summary: Go on a short but sweet adventure into the black and white world of Japan! Enjoy the search for cats and recreate a colorful picture. 150 cute cats, Nya! are waiting for you, Nya! Play and relax, Nya!

title: Mystic Gals
summary: In this adventure you play as one of three heroines. Where you must Battle, Survive, and Collect Creatures to aid you in battles. All for a chance at taking arms against an evil sorceress known as "The Great Creator". Do you have what it takes bring her evil to an end?

title: CardScrawl
summary: Enter the Chaotic Tower and take part in the Tower Lord's gambit in this Auto Battler, Roguelike Deckbuilder. Wielding the power of your Creature and Enchantment decks, the limits of your strategy will be tested. The Tower Lord awaits a worthy opponent. Are you ready?

title: The Curse of the Howling Woods
summary:
You signed up for a simple job - pull some weeds, make a little cash. Instead, you got bitten by a werewolf, tricked by an old woman, and thrown into a maze of crypts, curses, and questionable life choices.

Now you have two hours to undo your fate before you sprout fur and start howling at the moon.

The Curse of the Howling Woods is a 2D adventure game that blends classic horror tropes, witty dialogue, and cozy but chaotic gameplay. Navigate haunted woods, solve puzzles, dodge traps, and try not to get mugged by a pumpkin.

Features

Cozy Combat – Enemies? One hit and they’re gone. You? Well… hopefully, you’re lucky.

A Maze of Mayhem – Crypts, quicksand, rolling boulders—this forest wants you to fail.

A Cast of Oddballs – Befriend (or avoid) scam-artist Eudora, overly dramatic ghosts, and Tim the werewolf, who insists it was just business.

Survive the night, break the curse, and maybe - just maybe - get paid for your trouble.

title: Dread Tomb
summary: Dread Tomb is a multiplayer cooperative horror game based on Chinese folk rumors. You will face a rugged random map environment and terrain construction, adventure in various harsh random weather conditions, and discover a variety of thrilling mechanisms and mysterious monsters waiting for you.

title: iDigging
summary: In iDigging, you’ll balance treasure hunting, home improvement, and the strategy of hiding from curious neighbors and authorities. Upgrade, dig, and create your best life despite all the challenges!

title: Stray of Lost Cat
summary: Welcome to "Stray of Lost Cat" ,where your mission is to save a cat with a peculiar personality. Learn how to deal with the suddenly appearing "Mischief," collect soul fragments scattered across different scenes, and embark on a relaxing and healing adventure~

title: Refence
summary: Refence is a roguelike based idle defense game, where you can choose heroes and their traits, upgrade your castle, and manage resources to fend off enemies trying to attack your castle.

title: Game of Rollink
summary: Game of Rollink is a PvP card game with auto-battler, where you play as a medieval lord to outwit sinister opponents on the gaming table and seize the supreme throne. Bet wisely because gold and countless lives of loyal soldiers are at stake. Make your best hand and may the odds be in your favor.

title: Suit Up
summary: A new threat arises! Will you stand up and protect the planet?It’s time to SUIT UP, survive an alien invasion and protect your loved ones in a world where Wave Survival, Twin Stick Shooters, RPG and Roguelite come together in one epic mashup!

title: Eastwind Adventures: Chapter 1
summary: Eastwind Adventures Chapter 1 is a game of storytelling and adventure for all ages. Go on a great quest with three different heroes, some good, some not so good, and uncover the mysteries and magic of the lands of Eastwind!

title: Journey Up
summary: Gain sentience and climb up out of the mines and beyond on your own or online with up to 4 players. Play with checkpoints or without for a more tense experience. Supports VR and desktop monitor mode. Can you reach the top?

title: SCP: A Star Replicator
summary: It's an action shooting game that combines the elements of survival and action RPG, Weapons are enhanced with different parts, skills are upgraded to remove SCP. It deals with the unique SCP of the SCP world view, and enjoy casual survival and combat.

title: Firelore: Short Tales
summary: 3 short stories set in a mystical fantasy universe. You are a newborn Face of God. Hear tales of human suffering and triumph. Decide which Face of God you are. Pick a different fate for each main character. A short, linear experience that is introspective, emotional and spiritual.

title: Túatha Echoes: The Village
summary: Immerse yourself in the psychological horror of The Village, where whispers bend reality and ordinary life spirals into madness. Unravel the dark rise of one of Túatha's most infamous figures in this short story visual novel.

title: The Exit of Nightmare
summary: The Exit of Nightmare is a psychological horror game with collection and puzzle elements. You're trapped in nightmare world and your goal is to find your way back to reality.

title: Corner Kitchen Fast Food Simulator
summary: Buy cooking equipment, prepare delicious meals, and serve hungry customers. Upgrade your setup, read customer reviews, and expand your business to become the top fast-food joint in the city.

title: Freddy Farmer
summary: Freddy Farmer is a retro arcade style game with 16-bit pixel art graphics in the style of the 80s/90s where you can test your skills as a player.

title: Grimoire Groves
summary: Restore the magical forest as you grow cute plant creatures with your witch magic in this cozy rogue-lite dungeon crawler. Unlock all spells, discover new plant types, befriend magical creatures, and unravel the mystery of the rainbow socks.

title: Lips Breaker
summary: “Lips Breaker” is the world's first Arkanoid game to incorporate facial control technology. You can swing your lips to manipulate the baffle to bounce the ball and break the bricks to win the game. The novel gameplay and well-designed levels will bring you an unprecedented Arkanoid experience.

title: Chess Bomb
summary: Chess Bomb is a unique puzzle game where bombs take the shape of chess pieces. Strategically use these explosive chess bombs to fend off waves of invading monsters threatening the chess kingdom.

title: Dinosaurs in Place
summary: In this exciting two-dimensional puzzle game, you need to place your prehistoric friends on the grid so that they fit perfectly. Dinosaurs in Place offers 100 unique levels and 40 diverse dinosaurs that will not leave you indifferent.

title: Void Breaker
summary: Void Breaker is a space-based tower defense shooter where players protect their ship's cockpit from incoming asteroid storms. Using mouse-aimed energy cannons and view controls, players can engage in either an endless survival mode or progress through star-rated levels, all set against the backdrop of deep space.

title: Shadowveil: Legend of The Five Rings
summary: Recruit and command a party of samurai on expeditions into the Shadowlands of the Legend of the Five Rings universe. Gain experience and cards in battle to develop units and create powerful combat combinations in this strategic roguelite.

title: Super Miners
summary: Descend as a brave miner, face mysterious enemies, overcome traps, and challenge legendary Creatures! Jump, run, mine, and fight! Craft potions, uncover secrets, break the curse, and leave your mark in history!

title: Ligo
summary: Ligo is an exploration Sokoban game, where you solve handcrafted puzzles and mysteries about the world by merging, cutting, pushing small creature together and crushing squids with block. Each part of the world has different rules and challenges.

title: Merchants of Rosewall
summary: As a new Merchant in the bustling city of Rosewall you'll manage your own shop, craft artisan goods, hire Companions, and even unravel a mystery of the city! Immerse yourself in a fantasy world where conflict is a thing of the past in this narrative driven, fantasy shop keeper simulator.

title: Lilac 0
summary: The machine world of Molybdion has fallen into disarray. As Nidhogg eats the root of the planet, unending wars rage on the surface! Slice your way through hordes of metallic foes in five frantic levels, defeat fearsome bosses, and dodge countless bullets in this vintage vertical shoot 'em up.

title: Roll a Dice
summary: "Roll a Dice" is a dice game full of strategy and luck, combining classic props and set effects. In this 8x6 building table, players need to roll dice, activate cells, and trigger different effects to accumulate points and challenge higher goals.

title: Defender's Squad: The Last Ride
summary: Defender's Squad is a sci-fi vertical scrolling shooter 2D that combines 7 different levels. Play Solo and pick one of the 3 ships to kill enemies and save the earth from aliens.

title: Fomon
summary: A very minimalistic TCG card battler featuring creatures called Fomons. Grow your collection and discover a new unique Fomon every hour NOT DURING DEMO PLAY! Each Fomon comes with a tier and has its own attributes. Compete with others climbing the leaderboard.

title: Vector Strike
summary: Vector Strike is a fast-paced, physics based, non violent digital sport where mastery and teamwork are key to win. Shoot, double-jump, wall run, slide, dash, pass and score goals in intense matches where every decision counts. Pick your striker from a roster of powerful characters, each with unique abilities to master.

title: Sculplings
summary: Welcome to the world of Sculplings! Here, trainers collect and battle a random assortment of hand-sculpted monsters in order to become the #1 Sculpling Champion! Sculplings is a mashup of roguelikes with traditional monster fighter games!

title: SQR
summary: YOU ARE SQR. PART OF YOU IS MISSING.

title: Magia y Demonios
summary:
Old-school isometric RPG game with some more modern concepts.

You must challenge the forces of evil by eliminating monsters in a world where evil expands. As evil increases, the difficulty of the game also increases.

title: Wakey Wakey
summary: Sometimes you have to fight yourself to get out of bed.

title: The Devil Ball
summary: It is a 3D game whose story revolves around a world where its people are magical orbs surrounded by magic and wonders, ruled by the Celestial Orb Kings.

title: Tiny Duck Hunt 3D
summary: Next generation arcade game in a cute cartoon 3D world. Sweet graphics, nice gameplay, unique control system focused on handheld and joypad gaming.

title: Death Stream
summary: You wake up in a basement room, bound, with a camera staring you down. A deranged masked man entices his audience. You’ve been abducted by a lunatic who thrives on chaos and carnage. His goal? To force you into a twisted game of luck while the entire internet watches in real time.

title: Level up Everything!
summary: Bite sized solo dungeon delve. Use cards to activate gear or special effects as you delve through dungeons. Attack, block, move, heal, and interact with the environment using the unique card & gear activation system. After each delve upgrade your gear and cards to exploit powerful combos.

title: What's On The Menu?
summary: In What's on the Menu?, step into the shoes of a restaurant manager. From selecting ingredients and crafting menus to hiring staff and customizing your restaurant, every decision counts. Face random events, unlock new recipes, and rise through the ranks to become the ultimate restaurateur!

title: Face to Face
summary: A satisfying action puzzle game that merges the physics of Suika Game with a SUPER COOL set-matching mechanic.

title: Agent Dunoz
summary: In a dystopian world ruled by megacorporation's, you're a mercenary with a $15,000 debt. Face dice-based combat, moral dilemmas, and irreversible choices in this hardcore Sci-Fi Cyberpunk Text RPG. Will you reclaim your freedom or vanish in the shadows?

title: Siberian Way
summary: Siberian Way is a historical detective thriller. Follow the dark non-linear story and decide how it can end! For all fans of snowy Siberia, Murder on the Orient Express and twisted plots, seasoned with mysticism.

title: Songs of Life
summary: Card drama adventure game. With the epidemic, no one can be left alone. You will play as Hua Tuo, Zhang Zhongjing and Dong Feng, with the help of surgery, potions, and even the power of the gods, to end this tragic chaos, uncover the truth of the world and destroy the culprits of it all.

title: Magic Survivor Undead
summary: Slay the infected, Fight the gods and protect humanity. Only you can rebuild what was lost in this roguelike game. Gather resources to build up your base, craft weapons and create magics in this game influenced by Vampire Survivors and Call of Duty Zombies.

title: Femboy Feet
summary: Feet and Femboys? What more could a man ask for. Pursue your femboy fantasy solving unique puzzles to unlock the ultimate femboy.

title: Sealand Survivor
summary: Survive on Sealand, a mysterious WWII island defense base. Face extreme weather, solve puzzles, and fight off hostile forces trying to stop you. Can you uncover its secrets and escape before time runs out?

title: 101 Cats Hidden in Orlando
summary: Join this adventure and discover the hiding places of 101 kittens in the hand-crafted Orlando landscape. Earn lots of achievements. How many can you find? Be quick! ⏱️

title: Cascadence
summary: Survive and ultimately escape a foreign world using your creativity to assemble defenses with physics-based building.

title: The Butterfly Dreams
summary: A visual novel exploring reality, imagination, and the gap between them that we believe to be there.

title: Pyramid Puzzle
summary: A classic puzzle game in 2D and 3D. Make sure to start with the easy levels!

title: Bike Park Simulator: BMX, Dirt Jump & MTB
summary: Bike Park Simulator is a realistic BMX, Dirt Jump, and MTB simulation featuring a large sandbox skatepark, multiple bike types, and fun physics-based riding. Perform tricks, explore diverse terrains, and become the most famous biker in the city!

title: Deadly Heart Gambit
summary: You only have 3 months left to live. Gamble for extra time in Alice-sama’s life-or-death game. Be careful — she wants to steal your heart.

title: Shogi 3D
summary: Shogi 3D is a faithful take on the famous Japanese board game. Take a sip of coffee and enjoy a relaxing experience, playing strategic matches with traditional rules in a serene Japanese temple.

title: Stalked in Solitude
summary: A teenager's quiet night home alone turns into a fight for survival in this psychological survival horror. Scavenge for tools, outsmart a relentless stalker, and make life-or-death choices in a chilling race to escape. Every decision matters—can you survive the night?

title: Top Burger Shop Simulator
summary: In Top Burger Shop, whip up delicious burgers to satisfy hungry customers in a vibrant, fast-paced environment! Manage your shop, unlock new ingredients, and navigate fun challenges across 180 levels. Are you ready to delight your patrons?

title: Lucky Hand: Roguelike Deck Builder
summary: Lucky Hand is a roguelike deckbuilding game where every card drawn shapes your fate. Build powerful decks, strategize against challenging enemies, and explore dangerous places. With each battle, unlock new cards to help you in your adventure!

title: Dead Spaceshot
summary: In Dead Spaceshot, shoot robotic mutant aliens in the head, uncover the secrets of an abandoned military space base, and don't die. Customize your weapons, face deadly enemies, and conquer new planets in this intense third-person sci-fi adventure.

title: Supermarket Simulator Pro
summary: Take charge of your very own supermarket in Supermarket Simulator Pro! Manage every aspect of your store from stocking shelves to handling customer checkout, ensuring a seamless shopping experience.

title: Robot Fury: Mech Combat Simulator
summary: Robot Fury is a mech combat simulator where you can feel like a true robot warrior. Fight enemies with a powerful flamethrower, soar into battle with your jetpack, and finish off foes with precise machine gun headshots. Customize your mech and engage in exhilarating, epic battles!

title: Carmen Sandiego
summary: The scarlet super thief Carmen Sandiego is back! Adorn Carmen’s signature red hat and play as the vigilante herself to navigate a world of espionage, utilizing high-tech gadgets, and ultimately capturing VILE. Rookie gumshoes and seasoned detectives are invited to put their sleuthing skills to the test whether it’s in the narrative driven main campaign or the classic mode ‘The Acme Files’.

title: Millie and Friends: Hidden Object Puzzles
summary: Help Millie and her friends uncover hidden objects in this cozy adventure! Explore family-friendly puzzles in playful locations from Millie's bedroom to her classroom, and have fun learning along the way!

title: Stair Tap
summary: Tap your way through never-ending staircases, racing to the top before your time runs out!

title: Soccer Pro Simulator
summary: Soccer Pro Simulator is a realistic football (soccer) simulation designed to make you feel like a rockstar, making the crowd roar after scoring amazing goals. From powerful midfield shots to spectacular bicycle kicks, experience the thrill of becoming a true legend!

title: Potion Shopkeeper Simulator
summary: Potion Shopkeeper is a cozy 3D game where you run a potion shop, craft potions, set prices, and manage customer reactions. Unlock rare ingredients, experiment with recipes, and manage your reputation to attract more customers and grow your shop!

title: Bowling Simulator
summary: Bowling Simulator is a realistic bowling game where you’ll feel like a pro landing strikes, thanks to its easy to use controls. Grab your favorite drink and hit the lanes at Nashville Bowling Center, where bowling isn’t just a game—it’s life!

title: Malpractice Hospital
summary: Malpractice Hospital is a new take on the strategy simulation genre, that blends purposeful patient mismanagement and surgical treatment into one unique malpractice experience.

title: Seekers of Skyveil
summary: MOBA + EXTRACTION. Team-based PvPvE with top-down combat, where players battle for powerful loot against rivals. Gear up, make a plan, and set a course for Skyveil. Stealthy treasure runs explode into multi-team PvP chaos in an instant. Extract with your riches—or lose it all.

title: Money Block
summary: Dive into the world of cryptocurrencies and blockchain with Money Block, an immersive economic strategy game where you buy, sell, and mine blocks in an unpredictable and ruthless market.Will you master the blockchain and maximize your profits?

title: Mop Skater
summary: Cleaning isn’t just a chore, it’s a sport. Pull off insane tricks, string together epic combos, and battle the clock in this ridiculous first-person skate mopping adventure.

title: 9 Games, 2 Buttons
summary: In this game you play up to 9 minigames at the same time, at game speeds of 50-300%. You use the numberpad and QWE down, which match where the minigame is on the grid. Push for a new high score, trash talk your friends!

title: Speedboat Simulator
summary: Speedboat Simulator is a realistic speedboat racing game where you pilot high-speed boats, customize their colors, and compete in thrilling races. Navigate through Hawaiian waters, and make a splash when you reach the finish line!

title: Turbotz Testing 20XX
summary:
Turbotz Testing 20XX is a tower defense game infused with clicker gameplay and rogue-lite elements. Join the Turbotz Institute in researching the explosive potential of turret robots by testing them under diverse conditions and parameters.

Collect research, unlock new elements to experiment with, and push the limits of existing turbotz through dynamic transformations. Discover the countless varieties of antroids and the creative ways to obliterate them!

Change the world—one explosion at a time.

Twitch Integration: Connect with Twitch to enable full audience participation in a 'Twitch Plays'-style experience with advanced customization options. Decide how viewers can interact—whether through structured voting or pure chaos.

Viewers can join the side of the Turbotz or the Antroids, with their chosen allegiance displayed alongside their username. Their contributions are tracked on a leaderboard, highlighting kills and damage dealt.

title: Hello Girl
summary: Hello Girl is visual novel about connection and disconnection. It's about the love of places and the futility of trying. It's about knowing your place, yet still feeling lost.

title: Mutational Loading
summary: In this experimental singleplayer 3D horror game, a man struggles with adopting a familiar child off the street while outrunning the consequences of an agreement he made with his nightmarish stalker.

title: Deep Space Directive
summary: Build. Expand. Upgrade. Defend. Combine TD and RTS mechanics to defend your growing economy.

title: Dating App Simulator
summary: Dating App Simulator is a quirky little game about matching with people, talking to them, and trying to make them fall for you. You can date anyone you like; men, women, or both.

title: Fracas
summary: Fracas is a dungeon crawler that evokes a retro RPG experience and a complex story. In its short duration, it seeks to keep you intrigued as you solve the mystery behind this enigmatic character that has society on the brink of collapse.

title: Phobos Down
summary: A sci-fi twin stick shooter stripped down to the bare essentials with focus on smooth controls and satisfying action.

title: URLate
summary: URLate is a short and free point & click adventure that immerses you in a hand-drawn world filled with puzzles and mysteries to solve.

title: Destino Indomable
summary: In Destino Indomable, you're the new actress tasked with playing the main character in a telenovela! This is a wild visual novel inspired by the craziest Latin soup operas, filled with humor, drama, romance, horses, handsome men, Spanglish and slaps!

title: WDF
summary: ‘WDF’, Is a horizontal shmup game with a Boss-rush style in that the difficulty will increase slightly after the player clears all stages and continues to the next loop. Each loop will be different from the other.

title: Forest Asylum
summary: A short Psychological Horror Experience for one night that takes you through the dark corridors of a mental asylum. For best experience a dark room and headphones recommended.

title: Hephep Fever: Retold
