summary: In this arcade game, remake of the classic Hephep Fever, eat good stuff, avoid bad stuff, it's simple as that! ... or it is?

title: Succubus Challenge
summary: Fight a succubus, a seductress who will unleash sexual attacks on you. Fight back with nothing but degenerate moves, including head pats.

title: Star Crafter
summary:
A space survival crafting mining base building and star system building game.
Craft rockets to create planets and Dyson Rings, mine and craft advanced materials, terraform the terrain, manage electricity, farm food, and more as you watch the star system evolve into stunning, everchanging views.

title: Petrified Pawns
summary: Petrified Pawns has chess-style movement and turn-based combat. Fight new types of chess pieces and bosses. Build your army and keep them alive while you advance through the dungeon. Use healing spells, loot and strategy to keep your king alive and to reach the end with as many units as possible.

title: Alma and the Fragments of Cursed Memories
summary: One day, Alma finds herself presented with a sudden money-making opportunity that could solve all her problems. And so she sets out to meet the client... An RPG mystery about doing whatever it takes to get paid!

title: Bongo Cat
summary: Bongo cat needs your help. Bongo cat needz more hatz!!! Every time you press a key, Bongo cat will punch your taskbar. Type, click, play, work to collect more points. Which hats will you find?

title: Sweet Zodiac 1
summary: Sweet Zodiac 1 - A simple and beautiful puzzle game based on the twelve zodiac signs. It is personified by animals of the six zodiac signs: rat, ox, tiger, rabbit, dragon and snake. It has relaxing music accompaniment. After completing the level, you can Admire pictures of girls in the gallery.

title: Skull Skull Skull
summary: Skull Skull Skull is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you fight off hordes of skulls. Customize your gun and choose power ups to survive as long as possible.

title: Infernal Chess
summary: Infernal Chess is a dark fantasy chess game set in the fiery depths of hell. Battle on a volcanic chessboard with creature-themed pieces and master strategic gameplay as you navigate the intense atmosphere of the inferno!

title: Girl Abducted
summary: A quiet evening turns into a nightmare. Two sisters find themselves stalked by abductors. As they close in, the girls must outwit their pursuers to survive the night. With tense chases, comedic twists, and daring escapes, their bond will be tested in a high-stakes battle for freedom.

title: Pixel Pixie
summary: A Vorpal Knight with twisted ambitions has kidnapped the last Pixies to drain their power! Replace your weak starting party with stronger heroes, find useful items and game-changing relics, and assemble a formidable rescue team in this roguelike auto-battler, a love letter to the 8-bit RPGs of yore.

title: Hopepunk City
summary:
Hopepunk City is the fourth game of the Date Ariane series at arianeb.com. It was inspired by events that happened in the United States during 2020 and 2021.

In the near future, thanks to perpetual infighting, the US Government lost it's ability to keep society stable. The land that once was the United States got divided into various mini-states, thanks to a period of conflict known as The Second Civil Wars.

The 96 governments that formed in its place, raging in size from cities to multiple former states, come in many forms: Some feudal, some neo-liberal, some communist, some tribal, and many theocratic.

You are in the now renamed District of Artema, a "solarpunk" society surrounded by less stable states.

You play as a refugee, either male or female, assigned to a household of three women, one who lost loved ones in the war, one whose family split apart by war, and one who works in the government. Getting along with your roommates is a major part of the game.

You can play as the player character from Date Ariane and Something's In The Air, or as the player character from Ariane in Paradise or play as a brand new character.

Many jobs have been automated, limiting jobs to those sectors that can’t be automated, most of which are part time. Finding a job you like is another major part of the game.

The final act involves a crisis to be averted, but only if you make the right connections and get your roommates to cooperate.

Of course this is also an erotic visual novel, with the usual amounts of satirical comedy, nudity, and sex spread throughout the narrative. As with all my games, I am constantly trying to reinvent the genre.

title: Toy Scrappers
summary: Toy Scrappers is a thrilling chase-based horror game that can be played with up to 16 players. Some players take on the role of a killer attempting to capture others. Escape the madness and stay alive!

title: Synthwave Tunnel
summary: Take a late-night ride in Synthwave Tunnel! Race through neon-lit, rhythm-generated paths, pushing your reflexes to the limit. Speed through dynamic obstacles, synced to the beat, and conquer the ultimate challenge. Can you reach the end?

title: Shop Simulator: Waifu Pillows
summary: Konnichiwa Shop-owner-kun! Become a hero of the weeb/otaku community in a cute Japanese suburb with your very own waifu pillow shop! Stock your shelves with exciting dakimakura designs, expand your store, and make a fortune in Shop Simulator: Waifu Pillows!

title: The Dragons' Twilight III
summary: Join Trace and Mila as they unravel the mysteries of Mystrift Isle. Dragons have suddenly reappeared, and magic has returned to the land! Life, while peaceful and prosperous, had become complacent, but now, adventure awaits!

title: Tophet
summary: Survive the hunt—find the item and use it before the monsters catch you. Search the darkness, uncover secrets, and face the terrifying truth. 4-player co-op with proximity chat—stick together or be lost to the lurking terror. Your friends are your only lifeline. Will you survive?

title: Beast Saga
summary: Beast Saga is an open-world RPG set in a martial arts universe where you play as a young wolf tribe member named Lang Jiusi. Immerse yourself in a world of free exploration, gathering, crafting, life skills, martial arts cultivation, forming alliances and experiencing unique Jianghu adventures.

title: Spirit Driver
summary: From the everyday passenger to the horrors of Halloween, Spirit Driver is a short, casual conversation simulator where your choices can affect the fates of people and spirits alike. Remember, your choices have consequences. Good luck!

title: 9 Ways: Hentai Harem
summary: 9 Ways: Hentai Harem is a relaxing 2D puzzle game where you assemble pieces of artwork to restore a complete image! The perfect game for unwinding with a pleasant atmosphere, unique artwork, and simple mechanics.

title: Snackdown
summary: Collect, trade, and explore a world of food-themed fun! "Snackdown" is a lighthearted collectible card game featuring over 60 unique cards, ready for trading and showcasing. Perfect for casual players and collectors alike!

title: Hopeguard
summary: Hopeguard is a third-person dark fantasy game about loss and acceptance. You have been chosen to eliminate the Dragon Queen, but the confrontation will not go as expected. Journey through caves, ruins, and forests to solve environmental puzzles and fulfill your quest -but with a new perspective.

title: StarbaseSim
summary:
Operate the Starship space launch system and learn how to catch a rocket to understand what it takes to colonize Mars in this ever-evolving simulation of SpaceX Starbase Texas.

This is a physics sandbox where you can play around with Starbase devices. This is not a flight sim. There are some basic flying mechanics, but they are mainly intended to be able to catch the rockets with the chop sticks.

title: Scrapped
summary: Get scrap, charge beacons and build unlockable robo-friends to survive!

title: Eternal Prowl
summary:
After many years, you return to your hometown, but nothing is as you remember it. The streets are empty, familiar places feel distant, and the past seems to have faded away. The old school bus is your only clue, leading you deeper into a mystery that begs to be solved.

Immerse yourself in an emotional journey filled with forgotten memories and unsettling discoveries. As you explore an abandoned house, you’ll uncover hidden secrets and solve a crucial puzzle that reveals the truth behind the town’s eerie transformation.

title: Figure it Out!
summary: A puzzle game with an eye in it. And it's free. The game, not the eye.

title: The Turkish Bazaar
summary: "The Turkish Bazaar" offers players a true bazaar vendor experience. Purchase products wholesale from the hal, load your vehicle, set up your stall, and engage with dynamic customers to become the most successful vendor in the bazaar!

title: Crazy Golf Party
summary: A vibrant and whimsical mini-golf game that transforms traditional crazy golf into an engaging digital experience. Supporting up to 15 players in online or LAN multiplayer, it offers a variety of themed courses—including Funderheim, Elden Forest, Egypt, Windmill Valley, and Haunted Hallows—each filled with unique challenges and surprises. Players can personalize their golf balls with an array of hats and skins, adding a fun twist to the competition. Ideal for casual gaming sessions with friends and family, Crazy Golf Party delivers lighthearted, chaotic fun for players of all ages.

title: Interstellar Escape
summary: Absurd story,Rouge-like design,Asymmetric confrontation. A space themed,Rouge-like,Simulated escape,absurd style game. Players control characters to run,jump,choose,collect,solve puzzles (levels) to explore planets,use strategies to fight against enemies,and finally achieve clearance.

title: Succubus Forest
summary: A village is invaded by succubi each night. On a quest to defeat them, you enter the Succubus Forest, which is home not only to succubi, but many monster girls that will attack you without mercy. You must fend them off and reach the heart of the forest.

title: Neon Ascending
summary: Grid management roguelike tower defense that emphasizes mechanics and features dazzling visual effects. Don't overthink it, just stack and play! Enhancement modules boost your attributes, affix modules change the mechanics, and more... all within the grid. Time to create a new and improved build!

title: Whispers of the Dead
summary: A psychological horror game that blurs the lines between love, fear, and reality. The story begins with Eve Levine, a college student caught in a nightmare after being abducted on a rainy evening in the shadowy St. Peters Park. Her fiancé, Adam Hale, a poet haunted by his own creations, must confront the darkness that emerges from his mysterious writings.

title: Don't Let Me Rot
summary: This is a psychological horror game where you will solve puzzles and explore a 90s-style house. The realistic art style enhances the eerie atmosphere of the game. (Please do not play this game before bedtime.)

title: Cake
summary: please dont play its awful.

title: Cosmo Cats
summary: Hidden Cosmo Cats - Find and paint 100 hidden cats in this big cosmic location! Test your attention and relax in this cozy and free game ️‍♂️

title: Lawin Catch The Kim
summary: Lawin Catch The Kim is a fun puzzle game~Chicken Kim never eats and runs wild outside every day. As Kim's good friend, you need to take them all back to the chicken coop and eat obediently! The game is always given 20 levels.Take all Kim home!

title: Pick My Heart Chapter 2
summary: Discover the continuation of Sota's unusual love story in a world where mythology encounters reality.

title: Little Luna
summary: Little Luna is an engaging puzzle-platformer where every step is a race against time! Help little moth to escape the dark and dangerous cave!

title: Golf Island
summary: A golf game from Full Fat.

title: Pumpkin Hop
summary: Help the pumpkin jump from platform to platform and collect candy. Give your pumpkin a unique look by unlocking new hats that you can get with the candy you have collected.

title: Justice Ninja Casey
summary: The 16-bit classic comes to the West for the very first time! A princess in a castle has been kidnapped by a group of mysterious ninjas. Luckily for her, a young ninja named Casey is aware of the situation, and embarks on a mission to save her because... He is the Ninja of Justice!

title: Street Cleaner 3
summary: In this 8 bit retro action platformer sequel, you play as the eponymous Street Cleaner taking back the streets of San Diego from punks, ninjas, and now some weird spooky creatures! You're not alone, though. You can switch at will between the Street Cleaner, whip wielding rival turned ally Cogex, and high-school girl brawler Honoko who each bring their own attacks and abilities.

title: Mushroom Picnic Party
summary: Help find little mushrooms and prepare for an epic picnic party in this cute hidden object game!

title: Monster Ops 4
summary: NSFW Gay Visual Novel Dating Sim! Black Ops soldiers Wraith and Tide know they must count on each other to survive. Will their bond as battle-brothers evolve into something more? Monster Ops: Military Special Forces Hunting Rogue Monsters!

title: Foto Boy: A New Job
summary: Capture the Moment! Embark on a thrilling journey with Kin dream job.

title: Moon's Creed
summary: Choose your zodiac hero. Craft unique decks. Collect astral boons. Vanquish corrupted constellations. Ascend through cosmic chaos!

title: The Haunting Of Stabbey Road
summary: Discover the dark secrets of a once renowned recording studio.

title: All Abug!
summary: Faced with the threat of a wave of toxic fumes, embark on an expedition to save yourself from certain death. Gobble up obstacles on your path to allow your caterpillar to move along and board survivors who also seek asylum!

title: Bubumbu
summary: Bubumbu is a short and wholesome hidden objects game with a unique twist in which you get to help lost objects find their way back to where they belong, while exploring fully hand-drawn worlds full of quirky characters.

title: Idle Together
summary: A resource management and collaboration game where you gather, build, and progress through a unique constellation-based upgrade system. Accessible, relaxing, and endless—perfect for playing with family or friends.

title: Double Dangerous
summary: Shooting freedom—aim anywhere and unleash chaos with dual guns!

title: Money Theft
summary: Terlander gangster live in dystopian world which is full of zombies and enemy soldiers. Only way to survive is kill enemies and find money bags

title: Tea House Simulator
summary: Offer a warm tea experience while keeping up with the dynamic flow of the city. Step out of being an ordinary business owner and get ready for a simulation where you set the rhythm of the city!

title: Shojo Warriors
summary: Shojo Warriors is a fast-paced multiplayer brawl game set in a vibrant, anime-inspired fantasy world, made with『CliCli』. In this game, you'll purchase and combine equipment during battles to help the girls achieve victory through growth and strategic gameplay.

title: Hentai Tales: Scent Of Mixed
summary: As exchange students, Astrid Lindström and her mother Helena Lindström arranged to live together in the protagonist's house to facilitate their in-depth understanding of Japanese culture... What happens there?

title: Idle Airport CEO
summary: Step into the shoes of a savvy CEO and take control of your very own airport!

title: On the Q.T.
summary: On the Q.T. is a mobile otome game released in 2018.

title: System Shock 2: 25th Anniversary Remaster
summary:
The original System Shock 2 is a genre-defining experience that established innovative gameplay mechanics that are a staple of the FPS and RPG genre today. Delve through the corridors of the derelict ship Von Braun and immerse yourself in the story rich atmosphere and environments. Explore deck by deck and unravel the horrifying fate of the Von Braun and her crew.

System Shock 2: 25th Anniversary modernizes the 1999 sci-fi horror classic using Nightdive Studios’ proprietary KEX Engine for a definitive version of the game featuring Enhanced Characters, Weapon Models and Animations, Up to 144FPS performance with ultra-widescreen support, Optimized Controller support, 50 Achievements to unlock, Additional Mod Support and Quality of Life Improvements.

title: Exanimate
summary: Exanimate is a 1-4 player co-op survival game where you face off against never-ending legions of Zeds and their innumerable variations in a valiant attempt to escape with your lives, your riches and your highest possible scores! How long can you hold out against the Exanimate?

title: Peak
summary: Reach the summit of the mountain fighting off vicious monsters!

title: Boxel 3D
summary: Boxel 3D is a speedrunning game packed with challenging levels, custom skins, online multiplayer, and a creative level editor.

title: Sky End Market
summary: Set up shelves, arrange products, and make your store bigger and bigger. Sell your goods to the remaining people, animals, and robots in the last place on earth just before the human race is exterminated.

title: Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days
summary: Texas, 1980. Walton City has fallen to a zombie outbreak. Lead a band of desperate survivors from refuge to refuge by scavenging, crafting, and fighting in a relentless struggle for survival. Plan wisely, stick together, and — above all — keep moving if you want to make it out alive.

title: Card Survival: Fantasy Forest
summary: Card Survival: Fantasy Forest is a card-based deep survival simulator and the next installment in the Card Survival Series. Carve yourself a home in a primordial forest that has a will of its own. A day-to-day life simulator in a world where nature reigns with mystery, beauty and sometimes cruelty.

title: Frisson DT
summary:
Frisson DT is a single-player, psychological horror game. You play a real-life paranormal investigator / live-streamer. You (and your colleagues) will visit various spooky locations to investigate reports of paranormal activity and figure out whether the reports are legitimate or a hoax. Once that's out of the way, you can identify the cause of the paranormal activity and help to remove it, all whilst trying to keep your viewers engaged and grow your online presence. Oh, and try not to die!

Research new technologies to help locate, identify, pacify and remove Paranormal entities.

Collect cards and grow your collection.

Lean new ways to protect yourself from the imminent danger that comes from meddling with the supernatural.

Buy new equipment to help improve the quality of your live streams and make them more engaging.

Upgrade your player HQ by adding new furniture, or upgrading existing stuff.

Soil yourself with the most intense horror experience

Witness paranormal events to make your stream more exciting for viewers

Grow your online presence to make more money and beat the competition.

title: Mystic Origins
summary:
Julian, a wandering vagabond who carries a beat-up lute, has happened upon the land of Varekai, a place where Strazno, Mystic of Chaos, seems to rule. Once, to hear its citizens tell the tale, Varekai was a normal place where nothing untoward or out of the ordinary happened whatsoever. But these are interesting days, as Sirena, Mvstic of Time, might call them. An unpeakable evil has awoken in the Hamishago mines and thrown the whole of Palacido Forest into upheaval.

Maybe a wandering adventurer Will have the courage to take up the hero’s mantle, and venture deep into the mines to face Whatever lurks there... assuming he has the fortitude to make it that far. Hint... that wandering adventurer is Julian! So get going! Talk to everyone, use your wits, resourcefulness and reflexes to find your way into Palacido and investigate the trouble!

title: Orbis Fractura
summary: Orbis Fractura is the next evolution in classic arcade action. Smash through dynamic sci-fi arenas with explosive power-ups, relentless enemy formations, and a pulse-pounding electro-metal soundtrack. Designed for old-school arcade fans, it’s a bold 3D reimagining of Breakout-style gameplay.

title: Pick My Heart Chapter 1
summary: Fall in love… with a goddess? Uncover their secrets and follow your heart!

title: Grand Fantasy Heroes
summary: An epic Fantasy RPG where you will level up heroes, go on adventures, and progress in power until you can take on the Demon King.

title: The LEGO Games Bundle
summary: Build your library with The LEGO Game Bundle! This collection includes four fun games that can be enjoyed alone or via couch co-op. The bundle features LEGO DC Super-Villains, LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham, The LEGO Movie Videogame and The LEGO Movie 2 Videogame.

title: Sakura Hime 5
summary: Become the hero and embark on a sweet adventure with the girls of the Sakura Forest! Elves, witches, maids, catgirls... Along the way, you'll win the hearts of various girls and expand your luxurious harem!

title: Who's Next?
summary: 『Who's Next?』 is a real-time multiplayer social deduction game set in the traditional Korean hell, featuring a massacre of ghosts and spirits, with individual survival competition rather than team battles, focusing on 'Chasing Tail'.

title: The Local
summary: A fast-paced parkour game set in the Australian outback. Rail grind around the long abandoned country to complete orders or compete in timed courses. Master the movement mechanics and conquer the leaderboards.

title: Shift'n Slay
summary: A brutal blend of turn-based tactics and roguelike. Take on the role of an executioner, grab crime by the throat with the hand of the law... and smash it! Because you are the law!

title: Kollectomaniac
summary: A man offers you a job. Work at a log in the middle of the woods. Spend your money at the shop and improve your store. Don't stop collecting. Never miss collection day. Sell to the nine walkers. Stay away from the computer game.

title: Deck Combo
summary: Deck Combo - An overhead view game where the player on a card board arranges his squad in the form of cards that advance, fighting enemy squads, trying to storm the enemy castle and get the victory.

title: The Last Strand
summary: The Last Strand is randomly generated twin stick shooter. You will play a pirate trying to escape a boat and seek vengeance, fighting enemies, helping NPC, discovering secrets and finding items.

title: Darkest Mine
summary: Darkest Mine is a roguelite action-plateformer with built-in co-op. Fight your way through monster-filled shadowy caves, take your pick from a large panel of abilities and weapons, adapt your choices, and create unique expeditions!

title: Chinese Mythology: Journey to the West
summary: This is a casual lawn mowing game with Journey to the West as the backstory and rogue elements. Grow by killing monsters, gaining upgrade options, challenging bosses, fighting your way out, and unlocking more levels, characters, and magic weapons!

title: Sweet Racing Girl
summary: Sweet Racing Girl - A simple and beautiful puzzle game with the theme of racing girls. The work of five racing girls on the racing track is accompanied by relaxing music. After completing the level, you can enjoy the photos of the girls in the gallery.

title: Alehouse Tavern Simulator
summary: Serve Ale, Grow Crops, and Defend Your Fantasy Tavern!

title: Astroball
summary:
Astroball is a platform game for the ZX Spectrum and SAM Coupé, written by Balor Knight and published by Revelation.

A sequel, Turbulence, set on a rotating sphere, was released for the Spectrum in 1993.

title: Corporate Beatdown
summary: Weaponize everyday office items to destroy your coworkers. Exploit a violent work culture and rise the corporate ladder with your fists. Fully destructible office. Questionable promotions. Buckets of blood.

title: First Steps in Child Developmental Support
summary: Yuuka, a nursing student, is doing a summer practicum at a Child Development Support Center. Explore the facility in a role-playing format and experience child support activities. Learn about medical care, therapeutic interventions, and home healthcare over three days.

title: Never Experiment On Cats!
summary: The test cats have broken free! They're getting into all the equipment, from jetpacks to lawnmowers and paintball guns! Bounce, bash, and blast your way to the top of the scoreboard! Is there more to the lab? Who's behind it all? A family-friendly game you can play by yourself or with friends.

title: The Beautiful Island
summary: A short visual novel about war, peace and hope. Explore a city after a devastating war. Talk to people, try to understand, try to help. The heroes of war are dead, but you can be a hero of peace!

title: Vasterra
summary: Enter the world of Helheim and build your village on a desolate island in the underworld of Norse mythology. Improve and maintain your village by gathering resources and defending it from enemy attacks. Can you thrive in the realm of the dead?

title: [REC] Desolation
summary: [REC] Desolation takes you to an abandoned manor as journalist Ethan Carter. Your goal is to investigate its dark past and uncover the truth. But some secrets should remain hidden…

title: Hentai Rika
summary: HENTAI RIKA is not just a game but an exciting way to immerse yourself in a world of allure and elegance that surrounds this charming pop idol.

title: ARCA-102
summary: Face logic challenges in this Escape Room game, where every second counts! Join Mirra, your mercenary partner, to uncover the mysteries of an abandoned colonizer ship on an unknown planet.

title: Defying the Shadows
summary: Embark on a tactical roguelite adventure where you assemble your team of heroes to battle the Shadow army in turn-based combat. Test your strategy, adaptability and progress through the game to upgrade your characters and unlock new ones, shaping your ultimate squad for the battles ahead!

title: Mini Merchant
summary: Saddle up your Caravan Demon and journey out to explore the Land Of The Ancient King! Explore beaches, meadows, tundra and desert to buy, sell, uncover and unlock items, and become the richest merchant in the land! A classic collect-a-thon adventure RPG, from Astrarium Games.

title: ViCrew
summary: A tactical RPG with turn-based combat in which you build a crew of Vikings to go on glorious raids.

title: NecroWorld
summary: NecroWorld is a RPG that takes place in the NecroCatic Games world with many unique characters, enemies, upgrades and collectibles!

title: Workshop Simulator VR
summary: Become the atelier artisan you've always wanted to be. Take on restoration contracts, scale up your toolkit, and expand your workshop in the calming, immersive experience of Workshop Simulator VR.

title: DDinosaur with Double D's
summary: DDinosaur has felt alone for millions of years now... Will she be able to find love without revealing her biggest secret? That she's a Dinosaur...with double D's.

title: Totem Clash
summary: Collect blocks to summon units and defeat ghosts! Totem Clash is a roguelike tower fence game where you summon units through blocks to defeat ghosts. Combine and strengthen various units to reclaim areas occupied by ghosts. Use each unit's unique characteristics to strategically defeat ghosts.

title: Doomsday Tower Defense
summary: Challenging tower defense game with 20 levels. Can be completed under 2-3 hours. Kill zombies in a doomsday vibe. Discover your own strategy to beat the horde. No fluff, no story, no BS.

title: BlueCloud Summit
summary: BlueCloud Summit is a RPG roguelite deck builder game. The goal is simply to become strong enough to participate in and win a tournament of strength against the strongest people in the world. First you will need to become strong by exploring a diverse world to collect cards, weapons and relics.

title: Word Warp
summary:
Do you like word search games? In Word Warp, you must find more than 3000 words in 10 lan-guages (27000 Words).
Choose your favorite category out of 8 or mix them all together for the ultimate word find chal-lenge.
Three difficulties will help you adjust the game to your skills.

title: Mills of Morris
summary: Morris has long desired human life. He believes living as a human being is much better. Navigate through the Wizard’s puzzles and help him reach his goal in this pixel art sokoban, inspired by the classic Mills board game!

title: Super Meddl Boy
summary: Super Meddl Boy is an action-packed platformer game. Only the toughest Meddlers make it to the finish line - are you ready to take the stage?

title: Mesopotamia: The Game
summary: Mesopotamia: The Game is a historical adventure where you engage in farming, blacksmithing, soldiering as you uncover secrets, gather allies, and rise to power. Experience rich storytelling, strategic gameplay, deep character interactions and moral dilemmas in a quest for vengeance and justice.

title: Cosmula
summary: Engage in an intense space shooter that you can play singleplayer or multiplayer with up to six players. Play a variety of different spaceships, each with their own unique stats, components, and playstyles!

title: The Stamp
summary: Piece together your memories. Reveal the truth. A minimalistic Lovecraftian tale of symbols, sentences, and quiet discovery.

title: The Well of Essenwood
summary: Embark on an enchanting journey in a medieval fairytale land. Play as two main characters, Red Riding Hood and Bo-Peep. Each begins their own adventure, and eventually unite to unravel a sinister plot to seize the magical well in the Essenwoods, which contains the very essence of magic in the land.

title: Juggling
summary: It's a game where you just keep clicking. Click to see the girl juggling.

title: Century of Anticipation
summary: Locked away at home, time slows to a crawl, your only company is yourself. In this short adventure, your challenge might be the toughest of all: make time pass again!

title: Blackbeard's Treasure
summary:
Toss coins and rule the high seas!
Golden riches slumber on the treasure islands that await you!

title: Shadow Spell Saga: The Winds of Fate
summary: A tactical RPG set in an original fantasy world. Driven by story, characters, and nostalgic strategy gameplay. 26 chapters, 40+ playable characters, and dozens of secrets to discover.

title: SGS Battle For: Dien Bien Phu
summary: The emblematic siege battle of Dien Bien Phu that ended French rule over Indochina in 1954. Fight for the defense of the fortified camp or try to storm it, in order to reach the upcoming Geneva Peace Conference in a position of force.

title: Frogo Jump
summary: Frogo Jump is a precision platformer with restricted movement. Play Frogo who can only jump his way out of wells he fell into.

title: 3D Modern Tower
summary: 3D Modern Tower is a 3D tower defense game where you strategically place towers to fend off waves of enemies! Plan your defenses, upgrade your weapons, and face increasingly powerful foes as you protect your base.

title: Mortal Darkness
summary: “One grim dawn and noble I wake, The darkness is rampant, our oath shall break. A noble warrior soon shall rise, and clear the air of the darkened skies.”

title: Mining
summary: Mining is a click game where you can click on the mining pile! In Banana, you can click on the heap to mine ore! Occasionally, you may drop a mineral. Come and play with us!

title: Dark Return
summary: Immerse yourself in a dark journey filled with secrets and horror, as John returns home after receiving a mysterious letter from a family member stating that he must return home after traveling for treatment. Discover terrifying facts and uncover buried secrets in an exciting and fun experience.

title: Global Shipping Simulator
summary: Dive into the fast-paced world of logistics and become the master of delivery. Manage your business, customize your space, and ensure every order is delivered on time. Can you build a delivery empire?

title: Lawnmower Game: Survival
summary: Drive a lawnmower across 15 different levels. The player has 60 seconds to find a coin and finish each level.

title: Fell
summary: Fell is a 2d Precision Platformer with a retro 1-bit aesthetic. Play through multiple unique areas, unlock new color palettes, and use fun movement abilities to conquer levels and make difficult jumps!

title: Serke
summary: Serke is a hack and slash game where you fight against a virus invasion. Use 5 different weapons to defeat your enemies and save the virtual world.

title: Altar
summary: A supernatural horror game where you hunt and banish ghosts by locating altars, using tools, and surviving deadly attacks in procedurally generated environments. Play solo or with friends in this tense and dynamic ghost-extermination experience. This is not a finished project. This is build 1.0

title: Only for Gamers
summary: The game was designed for only Pro gamers. There are many hard obstacles in the game. You have to find a correct solution to overcome all the obstacles. However, It will not be as easy as you imagine.

title: Grow Harvest Repeat
summary: Plant, grow, harvest, sell, upgrade tools, and craft. Level up skills to build your farming empire!

title: Fix-mas
summary: 『Fix-mas』 is a top-view action game centered on Just Avoidance. Make a screw over the enemy's head with magic bullets and accurate evasion, rush it in and throw it in! Make a screw over the enemy's head with a magic bullet, rush it in and throw it in!

title: RLChess
summary: Dive into the ultimate chess showdown with RLChess! It's not just a board game; it's an epic battlefield where classic chess meets wild party antics. Get ready for a chess revolution that's packed with thrilling twists and lively interaction. Charge into RLChess and turn the chess world on its head!

title: Gigabot Run
summary: Gigabot Run is a fast-paced non-stop action game that will challenge your skills

title: Drone Dash
summary: Race, boost, and soar through physics-driven tracks in this fast-paced 2D drone racing game. Master precision flying, compete on global leaderboards, and push your skills to the limit!

title: InfiniPicross 3
summary: InfiniPicross 3: The Conclusion of the InfiniPicross series! Faster and more complex procedural puzzles (as well as better looking), even more puzzles (IP 2.0 puzzles packed in), a smooth interface built on previous improvements, easy to tweak themes and a very easy built-in puzzle editor.

title: Shelldom
summary: In Shelldom, snails worship alcohol—a drink they love but one that kills them. Their cults sacrifice their own for more, trapped in a doomed cycle. But legend speaks of the Holy Water, hidden atop a merciless tower. Can you climb, endure, and break the curse? Or will you fall like the rest?

title: The Little Brave
summary:
Become a brave hero and embark to the dangerous journey though mysterious forbidden lands. Reveal secrets of the legendary past, find the last pieces of gone magic and gain courage to slay the terrible monster!

The Little Brave is a 2D action-adventure immersive metroidvania about a little boy Keely. Get ready for an exciting adventure. Uncover the secrets of an old tale, gain bravery and strength on the path!

Keely lives in a world in which a long time ago there was magic. But one day a terrible curse distorted the magical places. Keely dreams of embarking on a journey to discover the mystery of forbidden lands and the secrets of the First Wardens past. Once fate gives him such a chance...

title: Painted Legend: Knights of Ink & Paper
summary: An action-adventure platformer in the metroidvania subgenre. The graphics are made in the style of a checkered notebook and blue ink. Defeat crowds of monsters, overcome traps, explore the game world, unlock new characters and find secrets! And all this to the accompaniment of driving music!

title: Cafemart Simulator
summary: Create and decorate your cozy cafe, where guests can enjoy delicious food and drinks. Expand your service with a supermarket offering a wide selection of fresh products, so visitors can not only have a tasty meal but also do some shopping. Play solo or with friends in cooperative mode!

title: Formula Rush
summary: Formula Rush is a thrilling F1-inspired racing game! Race on real-world circuits, compete for the best lap times on global leaderboards, or challenge your friends in fun multiplayer races. With stunning graphics and regular updates, it's the ultimate racing experience on Steam!

title: H Index
summary: The Earth's poles began to change places, and this caused chaos. People sensitive to the changes become aggressive and start attacking each other. Scientific minds have created the Hindex scale, which shows the level of activity of storms on a 12-point system.

title: Rollo Boi
summary: Rollo Boi is a thrilling controller-based physics puzzle platformer where you take on the role of an adventurous rolling ball. Your mission? Collect coins, unlock powerful abilities, and conquer vibrant worlds filled with challenges!

title: Dualikiwi
summary: Dualikiwi is a puzzle game in which your enemies mirror your movements. Your evil clones are stronger than you - use your environment to defeat them and emerge victorious!

title: SSR Summoners
summary:
SSR Summoners is a turn-based combat online idle fantasy RPG featuring gacha system, allowing players to summon powerful heroes and rare characters to build their ultimate team.

Set in a rich, fantasy world, the game combines strategic gameplay with an engaging storyline, offering both offline and online progression. The gacha system provides a constant stream of new characters to collect and upgrade.

title: The Most Perfect Revenge in the World
summary: I made one request to the devil, to make my teacher suffer for what he did...

title: Cats Hidden in Japan
summary: Find 100 cats hiding in Japan in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

title: The Test: Reality Check
summary: The Test: Reality Check is one of multiple installments in an ongoing social experiment that can be classified as an atmospheric, psychological-simulation with horror elements. Dive deep into your own psyche to find answers to questions you've kept locked away, hidden from yourself for far too long.

title: Radium Lux
summary: Radium Lux is a physics-based skill game with puzzle elements. The sphere that the player must navigate to the target is attracted by two tractor beams and gravity. Using these three forces from different directions enables the player to maneuver the sphere very organically through the level.

title: Rental Store Simulator
summary: Run your own movie store. Choose your movies, customize your store, hire employees and build your movie empire!

title: Lumi Trek
summary: Lumi Trek is a unique rhythm platformer where you have to combine the three primary colors of light to overcome obstacles. Change the color of the moving star at the right time, and stay calm when deadly traps appear. It may sound simple, but this challenge will make your hands sweat!

title: Epimutation
summary: 399 days ago, the world ended. Epimutation is a horror visual novel that follows seven survivors as they attempt to navigate life in the apocalypse. Make life or death decisions, form bonds with your fellow survivors, and attempt to unravel the mystery behind the outbreak.

title: Anthony the Monk
summary: Anthony the Monk is a classic 2D platformer combat game. Your only weapon is a Staff to use against demonic entities across the dangerous wilderness.

title: Mini Bash
summary: Punch, Grab, and Throw your friendships away in Mini Bash! Join your friends online or locally in this chaotic party brawler and compete in a variety of physics-based mini-games! Laugh, cry, and never speak to your friends again!

title: Tale of Dark Lands
summary: Tale of Dark Lands is a fantasy action RPG in a charming low-poly style with the spirit of an old fairy tale. A brave mercenary gets drawn into an ancient dark story that threatens the entire land. Develop your hero and fight dangerous enemies! Become a legend and stop the approaching darkness!

title: Debt City
summary: A retro open world life sim RPG. Explore a seedy sandbox city, and do anything you can to pay off a debt to a mob boss.

title: Who Made This
summary: Who Made This is a fun, light and easy-to-play click and point investigation game. Put your detective skills to the test by walking around the city and visiting various places, collecting the information you need to solve the cases.

title: HoloRun
summary: HoloRun is a fast-paced, fun-filled game designed for Hololive fans to connect, compete, and celebrate their favorite talents in an exciting virtual playground.

title: The Solitude Project
summary: The Solitude Project is a complete rework of A Liminal Place Legacy (also known as Remastered). Find your way to the next level, do whatever you want! But remember... you will never find the exit.

title: Conundrum
summary: Conundrum is a puzzle game in which you play as a cat solving various puzzles in a bright and colorful dimension. This is not another game with flying objects in the air, there is a real physics that you have to fight with.

title: Lazer Tag Arena
summary: Join One Man Makes Games for the release of my latest title "Lazer Tag Arena". A free-to-play, multiplayer, peer-to-peer, free-for-all Arena Shooter, which is heavily inspired by the laser tag aesthetic and playstyle. Play with up to 6 friends people per lobby.

title: The Bean Trials
summary: In The Bean Trials, join your friends in competing to see who is the best! Play in over 20 different minigames all while trying to top the Leaderboards! Talk in text or voice chat with other beans while you complete challenges, win to earn coins, and unlock over 100 unique items for your bean!

title: Devil Hunters

summary: Embark on a titillating journey through Italy with Fiona, your alluring tour guide. This adults-only "spot the differences" game challenges your keen eye while rewarding your success with seductive reveals.

title: Philomel
summary: Join Donna, a young wife trying to help her fiance earn enough funds for their wedding. There will be a wide variety of tasks, obstacles, and distractions along the way, but nothing can stand in the way of pure love! Not even a lecherous priest or demons!

title: Shadowgate 2
summary: The sequel to the critically acclaimed, re-imagined, point-and-click adventure game is now available for preorder! Shadowgate 2 leaves 2D adventuring behind, expanding its horizons, and letting you lift the veil on the mysterious castle once again!

title: Reinbo
summary: Reinbo is a hack and slash where you'll cut your way through waves of enemies and bosses on a journey to rescue your loved one.

title: Aquilon Lust: Sex Arcana
summary: You Ren, a young merchant aspiring to open his own apothecary. His ordinary life takes a dramatic turn when he discovers a mysterious girl hiding in his wagon.

title: Cribbish
summary: The roguelike deck builder for Cribbage.

title: The Candle
summary: As night falls and a storm rises over the annual county carnival, you are visited by a mysterious spirit. Tasked with laying his soul to rest, you must brave his long dilapidated manor and avoid the horrifying remnants of his estate staff.

title: Helios Hotel: The Night Shift
summary:
Rose has just moved to a small town ready to start a new life. Luckily, she quickly found a job as a receptionist at the Helios Hotel, the fancy new hotel in town. Her first day proves working at the Helios Hotel isn't quite what she was expecting.

Helios Hotel: The Night Shift is a story-driven choose-your-own-adventure style horror game inspired by paranormal and slasher films. Play as Rose and perform the functions of the hotel receptionist while uncovering strange occurrences that begin to unfold more and more each night. This is a short indie horror game broken down into four chapters.

title: Hentai Puzzle: Naughty Nurses
summary: Hentai Puzzle: Naughty Nurses is a hospital-themed puzzle game! Solve 50 different puzzles featuring attractive nurses and enjoy more passion at each level.

title: Leena
summary:
Experience a unique game mechanic where when lining up jumps time slows down to help navigate tricky sections and dodge dangerous obstacles.

Enjoy a beautiful immersive world brought alive through high-quality unique 2D art. Enjoy the dynamic day night cycle, unique lighting effects, and varied environmental & weather systems that help make the world as engaging, stunning, and immersive as possible.

Buy today and start Leena's adventure!

There are currently 10 levels, I plan to increase this over time. Please bear with me.

title: A Few Days With: Valentina
summary: Embark on a sensual heart-hunting adventure with Valentina, a charming young woman. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Valentina's enticing layers.

title: Mars Survivor
summary: Conquer Mars, fend off alien threats, and secure your path to survival!

title: The OG Cake Factory
summary: You've woken up in this magnificent cake factory, but soon realize that a crazy chef is after you… Have fun baking cakes in this stressful Point-and-click Horror game!

title: Iron Skys
summary: Iron Skys is a top down bullet hell shooter with rouge like elements. As a lone pilot in an untested prototype vessel, you must defend the empire against a seemingly endless fleet of rebel ships.

title: Cubey Quarry
summary: Mine ores, smelt or grind, get money, build your quarry and repeat.In this small free to play game you slowly build up a quarry, either with your friends or by yourself, it's a perfect game to have running in the background and checking up on every once in a while.

title: HorrorCore: Maze and Pools of Horror
summary: Instead of a traditional flashlight, a camera flash – a brief, flickering, blinding light that reveals dark secrets and leaves you in total darkness when it fades. Every step is a fight for survival, and the use of the flash completely redefines the way you explore dark locations.

title: Billy's Tower
summary: A platformer about climbing as high as you can. Also, you might encounter enemies along the way.

title: Forsaken Facilities
summary: Find your fate in the Forsaken Facilities. Explore vast dungeons to gather a valuable resource for your mysterious kidnappers. Each day you enter a facility the only way to return is if you find the required resource. Test your luck to see how long you can survive through a variety of facilities.

title: Trip Japan Puzzle
summary: Trip Japan Puzzle is a screw-removal puzzle game set in Japan’s top tourist spots! Enjoy beautiful backgrounds and simple controls while challenging your brain with clever puzzles.

title: Night of the Witch's Invasion
summary: Defeat the evil witches, rescue the trapped bunnies, and defend the peace of the town!

title: Anturi
summary: As Wikku, embark on a search for your missing father in the unknown world of Anturi. Explore the islands and help the inhabitants. Also gather information about your father's fate. Improve your skills to better combat the unknown dangers.

title: Hentai Tales: Saimin Kouhai
summary: One day, in the club room, the protagonist downloaded a hypnosis app for some reason. Everything starts to change when the protagonist starts making jokes about it on Miyagami Yui. What will happen there?

title: Drop 'n' Fill!
summary: A simple puzzle game? Well, this is a groovy puzzle game. Fill a board with blocks to make a complete line, remove them, and rinse and repeat. Great plays will be rewarded with increasingly evolving music, and you'll soon start to groove with the very blocks you're placing down!?

title: Karaoke Love Song
summary: Share your best beautiful voice with a karaoke game themed around love songs.

title: Carpathian Survival
summary: Can You Survive the Wilderness? Step into a brutal, untamed world where survival is your only mission. Scavenge, craft, and hunt as you face the dangers of nature. Explore at your own pace, build shelter, chop down trees, mine for valuable resources, and fight to stay alive against the elements and wildlife. With every choice impacting your survival, can you rise above the odds?

title: Maraka
summary: Maraka is an action dungeon-crawler that features physics based combat. Delve into a procedurally generated cave system on an alien planet. Harness the power of magnets and the environment to wield as your weapon: defeat opponents by physically manipulating objects and the enemy itself.

title: Hentai World Festival
summary: Dive into a mesmerizing puzzle adventure as you assemble beautiful images of charming girls. Put the pieces together to uncover vivid and delightful artwork that will inspire your imagination.

title: Weirdo
summary: Weirdo is a Japanese manga-style visual novel set in DYL High School. It follows Wang Zhe, an ordinary and frail boy, who tries to win the hearts of girls and complete his experiments. He gets entangled in bizarre events, plunging into darkness. Each choice you make determines his fate.

title: Millennium Whisper
summary:
It’s 1999 and there is a rumour going around. If two people confess their feelings for one another at the turn of the millennium, they will be destined to be together in a thousand year fairytale romance! Who will choose you on New Year's eve?

Welcome to Escafeld College, the school in which you spend the next year meeting a cast of 13 unique characters. Taking them to a variety of locations and making new friendships along the way!

Building your skills is going to be vital to maintaining your standing at the college and with the cast. A delicate balance that will allow you to grow closer to the people you like. While also keeping you in the good graces of everyone else you meet at Escafeld.

Rather than the standard dry AI experiences trained on large sets of data from the internet, the cast in Millennium Whisper is played by AI that are exclusively trained on in-house creative work and runs entirely on your own hardware!

The possibilities are endless, and the way you play the game will be entirely unique to you. Each of our (13) characters has their own unique personality and behaviours powered by their own separately trained model. In Millennium Whisper you can have complex relationships and deep conversations, or enjoy a more light hearted experience, having fun with the characters.

Play the game your way, and write your own story.

title: Restless Voronezh
summary: Restless Voronezh - A game in the Top Down Shooter genre, where the player controls a hero and, using various available means, deals with his enemies in cramped rooms of a huge building, clearing floor after floor.

title: The Curse of the Demon Tree
summary: A top down 2D JRPG exploring the stages of grief and loss in a post-apocalyptic landscape.

title: Deadly Footprints
summary: You find yourself being chased through snow-covered terrain by a relentless killer who is tracking your every move by following your footprints. Run, sneak, hide and use the items you find to evade the killer, in a pixelart horror game where every step you take could be your last.

title: Bullet Hell Game Anthology
summary: Great news for Bullet Hell fans! We've prepared an anthology of games in your favourite genre from various indie developers! Try out free demo versions of projects that have just recently been released or will be out in the near future!

title: Sanechek: Lost Coins
summary: Lost, Found, Ate. A unique story about Sanechek, a cat girl who lost her coins and can’t afford chips. An indie project by a solo developer, created in a short time to tell a heartfelt tale inspired by a real-life character.

title: The Hunting!
summary: The Hunting! is a turn-based strategy RPG focused on managing and developing new heroes. Train your heroes so they are ready for the final battle.

title: Reaper's Awakening!
summary: An RPG Game where you adventure to the underworld. Ascend the levels of The Void, and Defeat Grim Reapers, Demons, Gods, Angels, and More in this Action Packed RPG Video Game!

title: Wilderless: Meadowfell
summary: Welcome to Meadowfell, the newest addition to the Wilderless series - a cozy open-world game crafted for those who seek to unwind and explore at their own pace. Immerse yourself in a serene, untamed wilderness designed for relaxation and creativity, perfect for players who enjoy non-violent exploration and cozy escapes.

title: Crabs
summary: This a port of a ZX Spectrum game to PlayDate. Playing the part of a crab you must eat as many starfish as you can before you run ourt of time or lives. Avoid the waves which will wash you away if you are caught.

title: RuneQuest: Warlords
summary: RuneQuest: Warlords is a battle-scale turn-based strategy game set in the Runequest universe. Immerse yourself in the rich lore of Glorantha. Become a warlord, master the use of runes and defend your tribe against the incursions of Chaos. Field an army drawing from heroes and creatures.

title: The Last Experiment: A Memetric Story
summary: "The Last Experiment" is a base-defense strategy game. Your base starts as a small shelter, and your mission is to conquer a devastated, monster-infested Earth set in the year 2805. You’ll attempt this by planting radiation-resistant crops while deploying unique combinations of passive-defense tools—designed by the player—to fend off the encroaching "Fleshvine." Your goal is to prevent it from breaching your territory, killing your creatures, and infiltrating the remnants of humanity at your base.

title: Kingdom of Piss
summary: Join two punk-rock royal heirs, Pretty Piss Princess and Asian American, as they dodge their royal duties in favor of adventures. This hilarious visual novel, inspired by TROMA films, follows the duo as they navigate the absurdities of royal life, and embrace their rebellious spirit.

title: Fastro Dude
summary: You are a space traveler. Your spaceship crashes on a hostile planet and you have to embark on a difficult journey to survive.

title: Forecursed
summary:
Survive:
You and a bunch of other inmates must go purge your death sentence on Earth, a cursed and abandoned planet. Teleport to a chosen location and be the last one standing to clear your sentence. Keep an eye on your oxygen meter and use the tools at your disposal, but most of all, stay away from the curse.

Curse:
If you receive the curse, your goal is to get rid of it before it consumes your soul. You are now the hunter and must catch one of your fellow prisoners. Lie and confuse others to approach them, or go for the chase and outrun your victim. The curse has given you otherworldly abilities that let you leap far in the air, see others through walls and hear their heartbeats. Use those to your advantage and don't stay cursed for too long.

Ghouls:
Death isn't the end. The curse has now consumed your soul and you can now take on the forms of different ghouls to torment the remaining prisoners. Crawl, fly or run, different ghouls will give you different ways to traverse the environment and attack the prisoners. Figure out each ghoul's best strategies and work with the cursed prisoner to spread as much chaos as possible.

title: Damsels in Distress
summary: Damsels in Distress is an interactive adventure. You will play as a lustful paladin who’d have to choose between sex and duty all the time. All this is accompanied by awesome sex animations and Japanese voice-over.

title: Satan is an Astronaut
summary: A woman who suffers from severe delusions wakes in the center of a forest aboard “The BUB,” a proto-generation ship from the mysterious Faust Corporation. Waking to a vision of a spirit she grew up with, she quickly learns that not everything is as it seems, and this waking cycle is anything but ordinary.

title: Carpe Dino: Seize the Date
summary: “Carpe Dino: Seize the Date” is a journey back in time with a romantic twist. Face the dangers of ancient Pangea, get involved in a few intrigues, and choose a mate to get through the Great Dying. Be ready to decide the future of the entire Dinosaur world… World, which is wider than you imagined.

title: Girl Card Battle
summary: A card collection game, with a simple logic, in which you will have to unlock sensual images for your museum and new cards to continue playing, unlocking 100 levels around the world.

title: Dead Dragons
summary:
100 years ago, dragons were defeated by humans, and the world became peaceful.
However, one day, the main character in the story hears a rumor about the dragons which were supposed to be extinct, and comes across a mysterious young girl...

title: Chained in the Backrooms
summary: Chained in the Backrooms is a 1-4 player co-op, mission-based horror game. Trapped in a blurry subconscious and chained together, toy bears must solve puzzles, complete challenging missions, and survive against creatures trying to destroy them.

title: The Day Valentine Died, and So Did I!
summary: A New Kind of Romantic Adventure:Break the Flags! Akira Morisaki set up "flags" with girls for Valentine’s Day success. But receiving too many chocolates triggered a fatal surge of “love power”! Saved by the angel Chocoriel, he must relive February 14th and break the flags to escape his doomed fate.

title: Biped 2
summary: Adorable robots are back to save the day! Explore an unknown planet in this puzzle action-adventure game and experiment with our unique, innovative mechanics solo or in co-op with up to 4 players!

title: Delinquent Community
summary: Welcome to Sterling Heights... Play as Jacob Stains and explore the town to learn about Jacob and his reputation in the community, meet unique NPC's across town, choose to make positive or negative decisions for Jacobs life, and optionally use violence against other residents.

title: 100 Romantic Cats
summary: 100 Romantic Cats - Join the cutest adventure in the Lovely themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of romantic places and Cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

title: CyberCook
summary: A cyberpunk PS1-style cooking game, serve up more than just food. Slice through enemies, decide their fates, and uncover dark secrets hidden within your dystopian kitchen.

title: 10 Blaze Escape
summary: Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing! Killing! Killing!Killing!

title: Unblinking
summary: Trapped on death row, unravel the dark mystery of an ancient horror to escape alive. Outsmart the abyss, cheat death - if you dare.

title: PropFight
summary: PropFight is a 2D physics-based fighting game where you play randoms props in random arenas, with random events occurring.

title: Relic Hunt
summary: Relic Hunt is an exciting clicker game where each click earns coins and gives you a chance to obtain rare items for your collection. Gather unique artifacts, participate in mini-games, including poker!

title: Escape the Tower
summary: Escape the Tower is a horror game where you must escape from a 600-meter-high radio tower within 10 minutes.

title: Moorhuhn VR Blast
summary: Get ready to blast Moorhuhn like never before with “Moorhuhn VR Blast!” Feel the unique blend of new and nostalgic vibes as you enter Virtual Reality. Test your shooting skills in a variety of reinvented versions of the classic levels you know and love. Every level offers new challenges and new weapons to unlock. With various game modes, challenges, and leaderboards, “Moorhuhn VR Blast” offers endless hours of fun. Compete with friends to become the ultimate blaster!

title: Jon's Jigsaw Puzzle
summary: Classic ribbon-cut jigsaw puzzle game play with original nature photography and animated puzzles. User-extendable means you can create your own puzzles instead of buying more.

title: Night at Grandma's
summary: A single-player experience where your grandma got possessed by a demon. Search her house to find torn pages from an ancient book and items needed to free your grandmother’s soul from a sinister force. P.S. Remember, demons don’t like salt.

title: Zero Point Survivor
summary: Collect up to 21 unique weapons and wreck machines, kill space squids and blast asteroids into bits. Gather valuable gold and spend it for upgrades and new ships as you venture deeper into the depths of space, to the Point of No Return.

title: Going for Nuts
summary: Do you like playing platform games and especially the old ones? A brand new and yet old game (in appearance) in 16-bit cartoon graphics. Experience a crazy adventure with an unusual hero.

title: Wild Lynx Jigsaw
summary: Step into the untamed wilderness with "Wild Lynx Jigsaw"—a captivating puzzle game that lets you piece together the beauty and mystery of the majestic lynx. From 30-piece relaxing puzzles to intricate 285-piece challenges, immerse yourself in stunning scenes of the lynx roaming its natural habitat.

title: Beautiful Checkers
summary: Play checkers, feel its beauty. Play in wonderful artist-designed environments whether indoors or outdoors. Whether you are an adult, a retiree, or a child, you can enjoy an immersive visual experience of the game of checkers where difficulty does not matter.

title: Bearly Delivered
summary: A 3D physics-based package delivery game

title: Survive Society
summary: Survival game in which players try to survive in a society.

title: OneDayOne
summary: OneDayOne - visual novel where you will dive into the routine life of Sergey, from which only a miracle and...your choices can help him escape

title: Code Reactors
summary: Build your own Magic Deck and set off on a quest in this magical battle-packed 2D-action RPG.

title: Puzzle Summit: Solve & Rise
summary: Puzzle Summit: Solve & Rise is a brain-training puzzle game featuring dozens of challenges like Sudoku, Nonogram, and Fill Lines. Players engage their cognitive skills across hundreds of levels, solving puzzles while improving memory, focus, and problem-solving abilities.

title: Comfort and Warmth
summary: A sweet and spicy 18+ otome VN, exploring the appeal of a caring partner.

title: Hand Simulator: Shooter
summary: Hand Simulator Shooter — a true contender for the shooter throne, inspired by iconic games of the genre. Take control of your hands to survive and dominate in physically realistic shootouts. Experience unique gameplay where every move matters, and become the master of the new king of shooters.

title: Fractious
summary: This game plunges players into a challenging dungeon world where they play as a brave skeleton,

title: Aria Skies
summary: Soar to new heights in Aria Skies, a 2.5D indie fighting game featuring free-flying movement that anyone can pick up and enjoy!

title: 108 Silly Ways to Die
summary: Caichen made an appointment with a female netizen from the same school to meet at an abandoned medical college, but was caught up in a conspiracy. Caichen planned to explore here and find a way to escape, but the sudden roar and the appearance of zombies implied that there were secrets hidden here.

title: Super Jagger Bomb 2: Go East
summary: Get ready for a thrilling new adventure with Super Jagger Bomb 2: Go East! from Italy to Mongolia and Kazakhstan, with new mechanics, events, bonus, leaderboards and more!

title: Dungeon Battles
summary: Manage the shared inventory of your party of adventurers and send them out to fight against other players in this roguelike auto-battler. Reforge and combine your items to change their shape and exploit the grid bonuses to the fullest.

title: Mournight
summary: Mournight is a horror game where 1-4 players collaborate to survive and solve the mystery. Explore locked rooms, collect cursed objects, and stay alert against a terrifying creature that hunts you in the dark.

title: Pop DS
summary: Pop DS is a match 3 game with a twist, you POP (don't swap) gems to remove them. As you progress you will learn new moves and encounter lots of on grid interactive objects. Enjoy playing the game casually, or aim for a challenge worthy of a gamer and go for 100% completion!

title: The Seabed's Shining Star
summary: Under the hazy moon, a shrine maiden meets a star. A short visual novel of a two person conversation. Cup ramen recommended.

title: Void Climber
summary: Climb to the top of a collapsing universe in this parkour platformer with roguelike elements. Gather resources, spawn platforms, and obtain powerful upgrades to survive before the world crumbles beneath you. Just don’t fall into the void.

title: DescTop
summary: DescTop is a cozy typing game where you can type at your own pace, in your own speed, how ever you like. You can type the target word given to you or you can type your essay in the ingame notepad; whatever you type you will be rewarded for it.

title: Evaluate
summary: This game provides players with a simple yet highly attractive stress relieving experience.

title: The Righteous Scar
summary: When blades fall silent, and blood tells its tale, a scar remains—a mark not of rage, but of absolution. In The Righteous Scar, violence becomes virtue, and what’s buried beneath the skin reveals a truth only the damned can see.

title: My Gambian Boyfriend
summary: A mature visual novel exploring the relationships between elderly English women and young Gambian men, blending humor and drama while examining desire and humanity.

title: Stop and Breathe
summary: A 3D puzzle platformer that teaches you a breathing technique to help with your anxiety! Calm your mind by performing the breathing technique, Belly Breathing! Traverse a school environment, solve puzzles, move platforms, all while being accompanied by your companion, Zen!

title: AmaZoo
summary: AmaZoo is a progressive and varied puzzle game, inspired by the classic video game Sokoban, but presented in side-view, like the old classic 2D games. In this game, you can solve a multitude of puzzles and put your logical mind to the test, moving and organizing different types of boxes to reach the exit and progress to the next stage. But be careful— some boxes are fickle, and watch your step!

title: Unforgotten: Ordinance
summary: Face your fears, uncover the secrets of the past and fulfill your own destiny. In the wild impenetrable forests of Siberia you will face those who look beyond our reality and only the right choice will allow you to reach the end. Test yourself in a new psychological ethno-horror.

title: Rosttle
summary: "Battle Roosters" is a solo-developed 2D top-down shooter where players must survive each round by collecting yellow energy dots on the field, navigating map obstacles, and employing various tactics to vanquish monsters, earn coins, and secure rewards.

title: FriendShapes
summary: A jumpscare-free abstract horror existential crisis of a lite-RPG. Explore Digressions - areas that continue longer than they should with sets of randomized text events and map variations for a differing experience each time. Features a unique non-violent interaction system with various Entities.

title: Arctic Motel Simulator
summary: Have you ever been to the Arctic? Do you want to open a motel in the Arctic? With the company of aurora, blizzards, polar days and nights, primeval forests, and wild animals, can you turn a run-down motel into a landmark in the Arctic?

title: 10 Second Rule: Infinity Labo
summary: "Escape the infinite loop in just 10 seconds? Experience the thrill of the 10 Second Rule demo" releasing on July 23！Register now so you don't miss the demo release date!

title: Orc Incursion
summary: Real-time strategy game that features both PvE and PvP modes. With a variety of different units and structures, each with their own strengths and weaknesses, players must use their strategic skills to build and manage their base, train and upgrade their units.

title: Astronomics
summary: Command a customizable star ship, assemble a faithful crew of bots and automate your asteroid mining operation as you save up for that ticket to Earth so you can finally come home... for the very first time.

title: Autogiro
summary: In Autogiro, a fast-paced, side-scrolling shooter, you take control of a sophisticated helicopter and set off on a mission where your survival depends on your accuracy, quick thinking, and strategy!

title: Sansagari
summary: Tranquil, casual, minimal puzzle game with soothing audio visuals and unique gameplay.

title: Ancient Ocean: The Fall of Atlantis
summary: Submerge into the ancient ocean of the Cambrian period! Encounter mysterious creatures of times past in this short-and-sweet platforming adventure. Treat yourself to colorful SNES-inspired graphics and an extensive world to explore. Who knows what awaits you?

title: Ellingby House
summary: Corporate collapse, financial crisis, a ransomware plague... and you have become trapped! The crumbling head office of J.R Holder & Sons will ensnare you in a mystery. Interact and navigate between rich, detailed 360° panoramas, while using items to uncover the story in Ellingby House.

title: DBall
summary: The Dual Ball Challenge: A Clash of Coordination. May the dance of your fingertips guide you forward on this uncharted path. This is a game genre that has never been seen before, and it will undoubtedly take you on a singularly unique journey unlike anything you've ever experienced!

title: I'm Caught in a Time Loop: I Need to Find a Girl as Soon as Possible
summary: The strangest things happen when you don't expect them...

title: Taco Terror
summary: TACO TERROR is a boomer shooter set in a cyberpunk future where capitalism rules everyone - except for you. Run, gun, choke, dive, jump(?), and slide your way through the forces of T.A.C.O. Take back New TACO City from these forces of fried evil before you become too... delicious.

title: Novus Orbis
summary: A combo-based deckbuilding roguelike through a space-time loop: collect cards, receive blessings, add pets to your party, and grow stronger. Chain together cards in the right order for max power, and act before the enemy does. Build synergistic decks, find many secrets, and make BIG numbers!

title: Trivia War
summary: The ultimate trivia showdown! Compete against friends or the CPU in a high-stakes contest where answering questions isn’t just about being right—it’s about survival! Each correct answer lets you attack opponents and upgrade your weapon. Be the last player standing in this fast paced trivia brawl!

title: Office Overloaded
summary: Type quickly to process incoming documents without burning out. Sharpen your skills, climb up the ranks and challenge your coworkers around the globe. Can you stay cool under pressure and become the next CEO?

title: Towers & Goblins: The Last Stand
summary: Build massive towers, manage your resources, create a team of powerful warriors, and try to stand as long as you can. Every choice you make will decide the destiny of your kingdom!

title: Cats and the City: Shanghai
summary: Find 100 hidden cats in the heart of Shanghai in this charming hand-drawn hidden object game! Suitable for dog-lovers

title: Marriage Contract With Billionaire CEO
summary: Your choices decide everything. Choose your love and destiny!

title: IT Hell
summary: You are dead. Welcome to the IT Hell where you have to fight developers, critical bugs and your old equipment to make you way through it. Armed with your keyboard...and some guns, advance through different levels, upgrade your stats and reach the final boss!

title: Devil on Your Shoulder
summary: See your name in lights on Broadway! Find fame, fortune, and true love! All it costs is your immortal soul.

title: Museum No.9
summary: Massive artifact collection! Build your museum with extreme freedom! Visitor revenue depends on your route design, and whether you can achieve perfect profits is entirely up to you! Enjoy light rogue-style adventure exploration, and use different skill combinations to battle monsters every time!

title: Cards!
summary: A unique collectibe idle clicker game with droppable Steam cards

title: Mayhemers
summary: Mayhemers is game where you can create chaos and mayhem in different type of places. Play solo or up to 4 people against AI or challenge with other players in 3v3 pvp game mode.

title: Sweet Fantasy World
summary: Sweet Fantasy World - You are a male protagonist living in a fantasy world, and the town you live in is often invaded by monsters or other countries and lacks resources. Therefore, there are many female protagonists who need your help, and of course they will pay you. . .

title: Coffin Delivery
summary: Trapped in a haunted mansion on your first day delivering coffins, you must uncover its dark secrets to survive. Explore eerie halls and evade a stalking demonic presence as you race to gather the ghost's remains and find a way out alive.

title: Cozy Aquarium
summary: Immerse yourself in a beautifully designed world where you can create, decorate, and manage your very own aquarium while enjoying soothing Lofi music. Whether you're looking to unwind after a long day or boost your productivity, CozyAquarium offers something for everyone.

title: The Immemorial Order II Sisters of Darkness
summary: The Immemorial Order II Sisters of Darkness is primarily a spooky, atmospheric, first-person walking simulator that doesn't take itself too seriously.

title: [K]night City
summary: Parry your way through Old York with Sir William!

title: Project Hailstorm
summary: A short story where you enter the shoes of a researcher sent to uncover the mysteries of a project abandoned deep within the Antarctic circle.

title: Terry's Other Games
summary: Hi, I'm Terry Cavanagh! You might remember me from such videogames as Dicey Dungeons, Super Hexagon, and VVVVVV. Here are a few other things I've made over the years!

title: Puzzle Girls: Cheryl
summary: Enjoy some cute puzzle action in this relax-alot one handed puzzle game.

title: The Butterfly Collector
summary: investigate the evidence left by a stalker and kidnapper and track the fate of a college girl. The player advances and watches the plot by clicking to make choices for the heroine at key moments, with different choices leading to different endings.

title: The Succession of Changing Kings
summary: A turn-based kingdom management simulator, with an emphasis on decision making. Will you survive and lead the kingdom to prosperity or die in obscurity? The throne awaits you.

title: Whale Flesh
summary: A short horror game where you dig through the flesh of a giant whale to find out what happened to your team.

title: Strange Pong
summary: Strange Pong is a classic Pong game with the addition of new game mechanics. This game is a game of tennis, the player controls a racket and must hit the ball. However, each level has its own features that make the game more interesting.

title: End Transmission?
summary: If the world was ending, how would you spend your final days? Explore a narrative management game set shortly before the end of the world, about enjoying the time you have left. Play music, take calls, and help the town face the challenges of saying goodbye to those closest to them.

title: Just Find It 4
summary: Lots of Difference-Finding Fun in Just Find it 4!

title: Astral Throne
summary: Uncover the mystery of a Kingdom beset by a Falling Star's curse in this retro-inspired Roguelike SRPG. Build your party, recruit new allies, and synergize your team's skills for decisive victory.

title: Hidden Tomatoes 3
summary: Explore serene forests, sparkling river, and rustic rural houses in *Hidden Tomatoes 3*! Find 100 cleverly hidden tomatoes in a peaceful yet challenging hidden object adventure. With stunning visuals and relaxing gameplay, it's fun for all ages. Can you uncover them all?

Extract elements, cast spells, interact with the environment, and combine spells to create new ones in this mystical adventure!

title: Sally's House
summary: A single player Horror Game made with Unity, consisting of 4 short levels with different environments and entities.

title: Alien Fury
summary: Arcade space shooter that gets progressively harder, the longer you play. It's a simple a matter of shooting the alien missiles, before they hit you. How long can you survive?

title: Nightmare Journey
summary: You're on a bus, trying to reach the next station.

title: Simp: Leveling Up on a Dating App
summary:
FMV (Interactive Movie)

"It's not that I can't date; I just won't date just anyone!"
Meet Tesu Kang, a simp who's never had a girlfriend in his 30 years. Now facing the harsh reality of aging without any prospects for romance. he realizes that if there's no path, he must forge his own. Determined to find new love through a dating app, Tesu embarks on what could be the biggest challenge of his life.

Join in and see how your choices will change his destiny!

title: Pixel Horizons

title: Em-8ER
summary:
What is EM-8ER? (pronounced Ember):

EM-8ER is a multiplayer, open world, co-op shooter that pits players against a ruthless, shape-shifting, alien army called the Tsi-Hu. The game is a simulated war where massive battles ebb and flow across the planets surface. Hundreds of players will be fighting at any given time in skirmishes involving mechs, giant monsters, and military bases. EM-8ER combines high action, 1st and 3rd person shooting with crafting and RTS-like elements in a vast open world. We call this genre: Massive Planetary Wargame.

title: Newtonian Horror

title: Monochrome Nemesis
summary:
Dive into the Darkness!

Enter the captivating universe of Monochrome Nemesis, a die and retry game in black and white pixel art, offering a retro black and white experience. Relentlessly face a formidable knight who gains strength and strategy with each duel. Each victory makes your Nemesis more powerful, ensuring a constant and renewed challenge.

For Challenge Seekers, Monochrome Nemesis is designed for those who seek a true challenge. Each combat demands skill and perseverance, putting your abilities to the test.

A Game Without Limits, Except Yours. Monochrome Nemesis is a record game, with no mechanical limits other than your own endurance. How far will you go to defeat your Nemesis?

Prepare to take on the ultimate challenge and prove your worth against your Nemesis.

Created with Godot by an Independent Developer.

title: Wizards in Shorts
summary: Wizards in Shorts is a fast-paced online arena shooter. Blast your friends with fireballs, electricity, puffer fish, and mysterious blue orbs.

title: Casual Sport Series: Tennis

title: Uboat Attack
summary: Rise through the ranks and become a legendary commander!

title: Coloring Game: Girls 2
summary: Coloring Game: Girls 2 is a sequel to the double anti-stress game (coloring by numbers plus beautiful girls).

title: Shieven
summary: Enter the enigmatic Luminora Hospital, where, as a researcher on the brink of ruin, you take on a case that will test your courage. Amidst dark rumors, you will uncover terrifying secrets that have caused those who dared to go too far to disappear.

summary: Tilt and jump your way out of the depths of a grand city. A difficult game where falling is your biggest obstacle, get used to starting over. Don't get too tilted :)
