title: Inkey University
summary:
You are Yasuji, a boy who just graduated from high school, and after vacation, will finally enter University. 
 
You will study in Inkey University, an "internal" university, ie, students enrolled there end up living within the complex, and time of each course is 5 years. Yasuji then have to spend all this time away from family and friends should make friends and adapt as quickly as possible in this new lifestyle. 
 
While in university several strange things happen and you have to make the decisions, right or wrong, and that can affect the whole course of your life.

title: Meeting a Hunk in the Park

title: 100 lil jumps

Hang on to your test tubes, because Frip and Froop are back! In this full remake of the Sokoban-type top-down puzzle game, you play as the young boy Froop as he explores his uncle's FripTech Laboratories testing facility and beyond to uncover a mystery while using unique and fun gadgets and tools!

In this remake of the Sokoban-type top-down puzzle game, you play as the young boy Froop as he explores his uncle's FripTech Laboratories testing facility and beyond to uncover a mystery while using unique and fun gadgets and tools!

title: Lawnmower Day
summary: A simple collection game with spawning tokens and enemy

summary: Sultan is very fond of precious stones, he adores and collects them, but his time is limited for collecting stones, but driven by passion and greed, he will never stop

summary: This is a semi-real-time tactical adventure RPG game. Adventure and battle in a high-freedom fantasy world! Meet different companions and embark on an adventure together. Different regions are inhabited by various types of creatures, awaiting your exploration.

summary: Slingshot your way to the top of a beautiful minimalist landscape. A deceptively tricky platformer where a single slip could lead to a long fall back down!

title: The Pancake Paradox
summary: The story of two women, who make pancakes in the middle of a sandstorm, even though the planet is dying. is a bit short, right? ...then a story that has a little more than that.

You awaken with no memory of how you arrived, haunted by fleeting images of a life destroyed—a house fire, a lost family, and echoes of a forgotten tragedy.

The goal is to create a professional level game that closest simulates real driving with the largest support for modding. The secondary goal is to mimic the fun of real life drifting and community.

summary: Dive into a whimsical world of hopping fun and ribbiting excitement in Froggies at the Zoo! Join our charming amphibian friends on a delightful adventure that will have you leaping with joy.

You can just walk around the map, you can try to embed your files for yourself. The main task is to try to find way to get out from there.

title: I Have More Hours Than You

title: Curse the Cursor

title: Pacifish: Recast
summary: An incremental fishing management game with several mechanics to interact with and improve. It can be played both idly, or more actively to progress faster.

title: Desktop Siege
summary: 《Desktop Siege》 is a free tower defense idle game you can play on your desktop. Upgrade your base and defense towers to protect against endless waves of monsters!

Navigate through seemingly endless hallways and abandoned rooms. Each level presents a unique challenge, combining the thrill of parkour with the terror of the unknown.

title: Malachite: Temple of the Sun
summary: Temple-trotting, sphere-shooting fun!

title: Winken

title: Neon Knives

title: Elf World Adventure 4
summary: Elf World Adventure 4 is the continuation of an H-game in the anime and puzzle genres, immersing you in a captivating world inspired by samurai aesthetics. You'll enjoy many new levels where you collect images of beautiful elf girls dressed in exquisite outfits.

title: The Campsite
summary:
The Campsite is a short point-and-click adventure game, inspired by and crafted in the style of early genre classics, and adapted for a modern-day experience.

If you have a passion for graphic adventures but never find the time to play, this might be exactly what you’re looking for.

With about 60 minutes of gameplay, a simplified UI, and no dialogue trees, it is an excellent choice for casual players. It can be played anytime, alone or with others, and is suitable for all ages.

For those new to classic point-and-click adventures, The Campsite is a great starting point. Featuring a balanced difficulty level and lighter gameplay, it offers an accessible and enjoyable experience for beginners, and hopefully, you’ll be captivated by the magic that makes this genre so special!

title: Hired 2 Die

The quiet Numata Hiroshi is being blackmailed by his classmate, Himehara Yoritake, into performing sexual acts for him. Their captor demands increasingly depraved acts from his hostages, and if they're going to survive, they have no choice but to comply...

title: Sibel's Journey
summary:
Approaching the subject of sexuality and gender in early adolescence can be scary, overwhelming, and often shameful. As a countermeasure, Sibel’s Journey taps into the potential of mobile games as a proven method for self-learning. The players interactively explore the content without having to ask an adult. As players’ engagement with the game increases, their motivation and ability to remember the learning material improves.

The game follows 13-year-old Sibel, who meets interesting people during an exciting weekend in Berlin. She gets to know their different ways of living and loving, then finally discovers the secret of her best friend Sarah.

Adopting an intersectional approach, Sibel’s Journey provides young people with sound knowledge and a positive attitude about topics such as anatomy, body image, communication, contraception, gender identity and healthy relationships.

title: Can No One Hear Me?

title: Mysteries of Perception
summary:
Mysteries of Perception is a detective game where you will see the same scene through the eyes of different characters. Uncover their secrets by analyzing all the clues. Switch perspectives and learn everything about the artifacts of the Distant and the deaths in their wake. Glory to the Stars!

Mysteries of Perception is a 2D investigative game structured like a choral narrative where you can jump from one character's perspective to another during the investigation. To gather more clues and progress in your investigation, it will be necessary to collect information from all viewpoints and confront them to reach plausible conclusions. Confirm your theories by consulting the stars. Jump from a past to a future perspective and discover every facet of the mysterious deaths that will be presented to you.

Dive into this dystopian universe with desaturated colors and solve the mysteries that govern the world. Perhaps you will uncover the mystery of your own death...

title: Mr. Hopp's Playhouse 2 HD
summary: A young girl confronts eerie manifestations and deciphers cryptic puzzles as she sets out to defeat three cursed toys and rescue her friends.

title: Crashed
summary: Crashed is a third-person stealth game where you play as B.O.B., stranded on the quirky planet SnamSam. The mission? Rebuild the craft and escape! You'll sneak through restricted areas and take daring routes. A splash of humour as B.O.B.'s detachable head knocks off the Snailmen's heads!

title: Little Lighthouse of Horror
summary: A pixel art psychological horror game inspired by the Flannan Isles mystery. Manage a remote lighthouse, handle limited resources, and confront eerie occurrences as isolation erodes your sanity. Multiple endings await based on your choices and actions. How long can you last?

title: Thesaurus
summary: Help Joan the warrior and her best friend Krista find peace and redemption in this RPG tale worth about 10-15 hours of playtime.

title: Six Legends
summary:
Six Legends is a narrative point & click game with a few minigames.
It tells the story of six young dragons, exploring forbidden parts of the world around them, and slowly changing how their own world works.
Play as all six characters as they go through friendships and life-changing encounters, in a journey of self-discovery and growth.

title: Those Who Rule
summary: Join three fresh recruits caught in a web of betrayal as war looms over the land. Lead your band of heroes through tactical turn-based battles, master unique abilities, and forge powerful gear to turn the tide of battle. Will you unravel the conspiracy driving the conflict—or be consumed by it?

title: Camelbirds
summary: Saddle up a giant bird and race to victory. Overtake your rivals, use various tools, and overcome obstacles on thrilling tracks. Prove you're the best rider in these wild races!

title: Tragedy at Ashville Lane
summary: Dive into a psychological horror experience and try to uncover the mystery at Ashville Lane. Step into the shadows of your fears and face them to figure out what happened that day. Survival is your only option and remaining hidden is a must.

title: Lanesplitterz
summary: Lanesplitterz is a 3D arcade-style bowling game. Join Hiro as he competes in a brutal bowling tournament to become King of Neo Las Vegas!

title: Bloxolotl
summary: Bloxolotl is a cozy puzzle game all about cute block-shaped Axolotls and connecting them together.

title: Enkate
summary: An action-rpg multiplayer with rogue-like influences, in a post-apocalyptic world.

title: Go Go Fight
summary: Very simple to enjoy the happy multiplayer VR Game. Tapping hands to move, jump and grip to climb and hold, no more things to learn. Dodge obstacles, bump into others, and rush to the finish line to scoring points.

title: Besotted
summary: Dive into the world of Besotted. A classic JRPG 2D-3D art style set in a fantasy world with 3 main protagonist. Each with their own deep back stories that's full of death, revenge, love, and destiny. Join the 3 as they team up together all with the same goal in mind.

title: The SS Destiny Disaster
summary: Humanity's ambition for the stars turns into a brutal fight for survival. The crew of The SS Destiny discovers a bacteria that turns their mission into a nightmare. Find resources, battle infected, and escape the doomed ship as it spirals into chaos.

title: Knights of the Round Peg
summary: Journey through Knights of the Round Peg's magical world with a brave lute-playing knight as you overcome peg obstacles!

title: Poop Rocket
summary: Poop Rocket is a casual sci-fi 2D shooter game. Bomb your way through debris and aliens before the poop power meter runs out. Avoid the debris and aliens, or you'll take damage and die. The game is controlled with your keyboard. Use the arrows to navigate and the space bar to drop bombs.

title: Lore Restore
summary: Solve intricate puzzles, create your own with Steam Workshop, and immerse yourself in a world of hidden messages. Are you ready to decode every cipher?

title: Unreachable
summary: A first-person investigative thriller where your family is kidnapped and you must carry out various demands from the kidnapper in order to prolong their lives. However, if you are sharp, you might also uncover clues to track down their location and devise a rescue plan.

title: BlockWorld Ai
summary: RPG puzzle game in which players train a mysterious AI, Hoshihabito-kun, who learns how to move puzzles and the results, and fight powerful bosses together with players

title: Wendigo Blue
summary: Action-packed 2D beat-em-up with intense boss battles and a large variety of customizable equipment and skills. Up to 4 players with local co-op.

title: Mansion Affairs
summary: Mansion Affairs is a mature visual novel that explores the complexities of relationships, desire, and betrayal. Players control either Alex or Emma, navigating a mansion filled with secrets and erotic encounters. The game features branching narratives, multiple endings, and a rich cast of characters.

title: Quiz & Learn: Geography
summary: A family-friendly, relaxing multiple-choice quiz about geography that includes photo rounds with interesting facts

title: Into The Depths
summary: A classic grid & turn-based roguelike, procedurally generated dungeon crawler, aimed at re-creating the games of yesteryear.

title: Renounced
summary: Immerse yourself in the dark and intense world of "Renounced", a hardcore survival RPG where each day is a struggle for survival in a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by nuclear war.

title: School Fighter
summary: School Fighter is a top-down arena roguelite shooter where you play as a student who fights off school enemies using paper airplanes. You have access to a school shop, unique perks, and an upgrade station to help you create a powerful character and overcome the school nightmare!

title: Suspense: Madman's Dreams
summary: This psychological adventure, focused on narrative, is based on a scientific representation of mental disorders. Are you ready to face the fears of people suffering from mental illnesses? Use your voice as the voice of the main character to get as close to them as possible.

title: Alacrity
summary: This game plunges players into a challenging desert adventure, where they play as the brave Piggy Hero, navigating through the desert using the ASDW keys.

title: Airframe Ultra
summary:
Welcome to the violent underground world of Ultra Circuit racing.

From the cracked asphalt of San Juaro and the Ysidro edgelands to the hulking megacities of the Texicali Zego zone, Airframe riders from all across the Southlands compete for fame, fortune, and a chance at glory… three feet above or six feet below.

title: Oh Boy Cheese Remastered
summary: Prepare for more cheesey action as you grab the cheese again hop on the broom one last time and remember get those presents when the game is finished dont forget to jump onto the scoreboard now you and a friend can team-up for an even higher score also go 4 player vs or take your skills online

title: Galactic Simulator
summary: Galactic Simulator is a clicker game based on the Fermi Paradox and the Great Filter theory. Players can simulate the evolution of celestial bodies and civilizations in the galaxy from an observer's perspective. The game supports multiplayer mode. Create a unique galaxy with friends!

title: Deathrun
summary: Deathrun is an electrifying online multiplayer sprint where speed, strategy, and survival go hand-in-hand. Team up or go solo in a race through a treacherous obstacle course where every player is for themselves. Dodge traps, outpace the competition, and don’t trust anyone.

title: SuperTaxCity
summary: In a country where taxes are repeatedly raised, you become the owner of a certain city and develop it. Build facilities, expand the city, and create a city that will not be defeated by tax increases!

title: Armor Stride
summary: Sir Stepsalot is trapped in the Cursed Forest! Luckily, he has his trusty sword and bomb pouch to fend off dangerous monsters. He will have to travel deeper into the forest fighting monsters and avoiding traps. Our knight can't stay in place for too long though. There's a dark curse chasing him!

title: Snowkissed Romance
summary: Fall in love in the cozy mountains of Northern Japan. Call, text, and make choices to snag the best ending!

title: Starling
summary: Starling is a student made third person base-building exploration game. As an employee of Starling Corp., your mission is to gather resources from across the galaxy. After an unexpected turn of events, you will need to rebuild your base while being assisted by adorable creatures known as starlings.

title: Hyperdrive Horizon
summary: Hyperdrive Horizon is a high-speed space racer where you’ll dodge obstacles, collect boosts, and challenge advanced AI on dynamic tracks.

title: Car-Toon Chaos
summary: Car-toon Chaos is an action-packed game where high-speed chases and combat converge. Play as a vigilante driver with fully loaded automatic weapons, pursuing criminals by day and evading colossal dinosaurs by night. Playable on both PC and VR.

title: Senet: Households
summary: Prove you're blessed by the gods in this Online Multiplayer Ancient Egyptian Board Game.

title: Matsuro Palette
summary: This game is a horror adventure game, released on February 19, 2020 by SleepingMuseum on Googleplay and Appstore.

title: Arrogue
summary: Collect, upgrade and unlock powerful arrows and relics to protect and restore your village. For that you’ll have to fight against procedurally generated hordes of enemies in this turn-per-turn, physics-based, roguelike! Explore the map, find the right path and make decisive choices in random events.

title: Horny Mage Chronicles
summary: A succubus has attacked your home, leaving you the only one to have escaped. A mysterious witch has rescued you, and proposes that you defeat the succubus... with your body?

title: Health Insurance Claim Denier
summary: An incremental game about denying health insurance claims.

title: Paranormal Mutagens: Cargo
summary: Paranormal Mutagens: Cargo is a first-person eldritch horror game. Manage a spacecraft and its passengers while battling eerie anomalies and struggling to survive the chaos unfolding aboard. Can you endure the horrors and complete your mission?

title: After He Was Gone
summary: "After He Was Gone" is a Tactical RPG. NO level-up system. Character's skills and items will change the battle situation significantly. Collect the treasures and lead therianthropes from getting out from the world of board game. Don’t worry. If YOU don’t lose hope, we can rewind the time any time.

title: Shadow Survival
summary: Shadow Survival is a single-player / multiplayer cooperative wave based first person shooter with deep class and weapon customization, on procedurally generated landscapes, against armies of procedurally generated demonic forces.

title: A Few Days With: Bianca
summary: Embark on a sensual butterfly-hunting adventure with Bianca, a charming young woman. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Bianca's enticing layers.

title: Subway Exorcist Girl
summary: A subway train plagued by strange occurrences. A part-time exorcist girl arrives to confront the supernatural chaos, with the unknown ahead.

title: Hentai Senpai: Goth Feet
summary: Immerse yourself in Hentai Senpai: Goth Feet, a lust-driven puzzle game where gothic beauties indulge in filthy foot fetish fantasies. Solve steamy puzzles to unlock explicit gothic scenes; all matched with a seductive soundtrack to ignite your deepest desires.

title: Rome: Nightmares of Empire
summary: Rome: Nightmares of Empire is an Action game with RPG elements, charming pixel graphics and interesting mechanics. Defeat your opponents, acquire and create equipment, improve your skills to face the great threat, rise up, hero and save Rome !

title: Awakening Sarah
summary: Awakening Sarah is an upcoming sequel to Dreaming Sarah, a 2D platformer with an emphasis on exploration. Unravel the dreams and realities of Sarah, a girl who's recovering from a coma, while helping her understand the world around her and herself.

title: Letters from the War
summary: Modern reimagining of text adventure games with a new gameplay and multiple endings. Censor letters coming from soldiers at the front and make the history of your nation.

title: Little Robot
summary: Join me on my first game as an Indie Dev with this casual 15-minute exploration game where players navigate the backyard, as our favorite sad robot, collecting essential components to successfully return indoors!

title: ReSpaced
summary: A fast-paced first-person shooter where you master gun recoil to leap across platforms, battle various enemies, and upgrade your weapon to escape an overrun space station.

title: Wait: The Patient
summary: Wait: The Patient is a non-combat mystery horror game, that takes place in the 90s and follows the story of Dr. Alice Fincher. After a new patient arrives in the mental hospital she works in, strange events start to unfold.

title: Fantasy Tower Defense
summary:
A horde of horrible monsters is attacking your kingdom, build your towers fast and survive all the waves.
If arrows or stones are not enough, use elements to your advantage and slay them all.

Build towers on the free spots and they will automatically attack monsters that come near them.
Use different combinations of towers and elements to your advantage.
If you still feel pressured, use spells and upgrade your towers to maximum.

title: Black Market
summary: Black Market is an item shop simulator where you are a shopkeeper that pawns items and strikes deals with your villainous customers in order to make rent. It's a cutthroat world out there.

title: Snowscape
summary: Snowscape is a roguelite adventure that combines top-down survival with snowmobile racing. Race down risky snowy mountains by day and survive the monstrous horrors lurking in the dark by night. Can you escape the twisted nightmare of this mysterious, frozen wilderness?

title: Cosmic Clash
summary: Battle your friends for space superiority in this arcade style space shooter. Select your star fighter and jump into Cosmic Clash where you try and eliminate your friends while surviving the perils of space.

title: Shadows Over Whispering Pines
summary: A first-person mystery adventure where you solve puzzles, answer calls, and navigate dangers as a nightwatch in a secluded wilderness park.

title: Benign Land
summary: A short, dreamlike experience where you drift through haunting scenes set in Ireland, from pagan times to recent historical events, revolving around the Troubles of Northern Ireland.

title: Global Transport
summary: Global Transport is a fun and engaging game that will test your problem-solving and time-management skill

title: Lord of the Click 5
summary: Open a new chapter of epic battles! In "Lord of the Click 5" you will find a strategic deployment of troops, army upgrades and battles with powerful bosses. Evolve, use magic, and protect your kingdom from impending threats!

title: Apple Man
summary: Apple Man is no ordinary fruit... Due to a mysterious force beyond anyone's comprehension, He has been blessed with two unbreakable legs, and a myriad of special abilities. With his newfound power, he is absolutely determined to accomplish his lifelong dream of reaching the sky.

title: One Room Dungeon
summary: A roguelike team builder, auto-battler meets inventory management, where you are a little dungeon keeper who has to fit minions, artifacts, and items in a very tidy way in his tiny one-room dungeon to empower himself to protect the dungeon from the raiding adventurers.

title: Pinball Neon
summary: This is Pinball Arcade Simulator game with modern graphics. You can use Keybord, mouse, touchscreen or Gamapad(XBox or Dualshock) Use “Tilt”, but do not use often, this is can brake the table. You can use GOLDEN BALL from inventory.

title: Rogue Zodiacs
summary: A content-rich, turn-based roguelike with truly endless replay value achieved by having countless varieties because all contents are unique. 250+ unique abilities, 200+ unique relics, 16+ locations, 40+ hazards, 90+ unique enemies, and the 12 Zodiacs guarantee each of your runs will be different.

title: The Yapori Clicker
summary: Yapori Clicker is a Clicker game where you need to keep clicking Yapori to level up and unlock skins, get coins, armor and more

title: Pirates Never Die
summary: Pirates Never Die is a third-person horror zombie game set in a chilling, atmospheric world where players must uncover the mysteries of a cursed island. Play as Deacon, a young pirate in search for his brother after rumors of his disappearance. Faced with a new reality the fight for survival begins.

title: Cursed Feed
summary:
In first-person horror game "Cursed Feed," players embark on a chilling journey with the Thornvale family as they confront a malevolent force unleashed by their own patriarch's archaeological discoveries.

Richard Thornvale, a renowned archaeologist, returns from a harrowing expedition in the Middle East with cryptic artifacts in tow, he unwittingly invites an ancient curse into their tranquil home. Soon, inexplicable phenomena plague the household, and Emily, their young daughter, becomes the focal point of the sinister presence.

With each passing night, the family is tormented by terrifying apparitions and escalating paranormal activity, leading them to unravel dark secrets buried within the walls of their own home.

As they delve deeper into the mystery, they must confront their own fears and uncover the truth behind the curse before it consumes them all. Will they break free from the grip of the past, or will they become mere echoes in the haunted halls of their own history?

title: Eva's Hook
summary: A 2.5D Platformer with a Grappling Hook, Collectibles, and a Timer for an extra Challenge while different Events are trying to make you fail, 3 different Difficulties, but even the Easiest one could be a hard time for you !

title: Parkour Assassin: Sprint Run
summary: A 3D parkour game in a cyberpunk style, where you can experience breathtaking speeds, dodge various traps, and continuously break through to achieve the furthest distance. Terrifying bombs and robotic enemies will stand in your way, but you can use the quick blade in your hand to slash through them!

title: Crimson Snow Deluxe
summary: CRIMSON SNOW DELUXE: A psychological horror RPG where you destroy the world you've created...

title: Wukong Fight in Kaoria
summary: This is a single player action adventure game that includes mythological themed character actions and role-playing, You can use regular attacks and skills, spells, such as magic, celestial phenomena, and body fixing spells, to Fight and defeat the enemies you encounter.

title: Rise of Kenshin
summary: Demons invasion, the young heroes face the heavy siege of the enemy, they fought in blood and finally recovered the lost land. This is a national style Roguelike casual game, players can play a variety of roles, gradually grow, and experience the hearty grass-cutting battles.

title: Lunavania
summary: Lunavania is an Anime pixel horizontal action shooting game with unique pixel art style and roguelite elements.The game has rich build structures, over a hundred different styles of weapons, equipment, skills, which can be infinitely stacked and freely combined to experience the fun of meat pigeons.

title: AI Learns To Drive
summary: Train AI to drive! Create your own neural network and watch it evolve from chaos to mastery with the power of evolutionary algorithms and natural selection. Fine-tune the learning process to craft the ultimate AI driver, and test your creation in campaign challenges or on custom-built tracks.

title: /R
summary: Run, hide, adapt and survive in a mansion of endless night and bizarre brain-twisting phenomena in this 2D hand-drawn psychological horror title.

title: Laundry Room Dilemma
summary: You find yourself amnesiac and trapped in a laundry room. You can earn food by working. Who built this place? How do you escape?

title: 3D Raid River
summary: Recover the Console that the Pirates try to destroy anyway. Travel back in time with incredible graphics

title: I Am Here, I Won't Disappear. I Am Here, I Won't...
summary: A black-white-and-red visual novel about a girl afraid of disappearing. And a bit about her cat.

title: Sword of the Necromancer: Resurrection
summary: Help Tama to save Koko using the powers of the forbidden Sword of the Necromancer. Turn your foes into allies and reach the depths of the Necromancer's dungeon. Gain enough power to bring Koko back from the dead, no matter the cost. Now in 3D and with a renewed battle system!

title: Dead of Darkness
summary: Dead of Darkness is a 2D survival-horror action-adventure. Investigate a missing persons case on Velvet Island and unravel its disturbing secret. You’ll have to face grotesque creatures, hurdle deadly traps, solve puzzles, and most importantly, survive.

title: The 13th Floor
summary: As a weary security guard, navigate a 13-story office building to find your way home. Traverse each floor on foot, moving between elevators while observing subtle details. Set in broad daylight, this exploration game blends curiosity with logic as you uncover the building's secrets.

title: Airships: Lost Flotilla
summary: Airships: Lost Flotilla is a steampunk autoshooter where you fight your way through waves of enemies on your way to a safe harbour. Destroy your foes, harvest wreckage, and upgrade your ship.

title: Bananitro
summary: Bananitro is a 2D game where you control Monkey on his bicycle, using Bananitro to perform maneuvers and conquer obstacle-filled tracks, with creativity as the key to success.

title: Wren's Resurgence
summary: Wren’s Resurgence is a 2D action platformer where Wren must fight her way through the Yokai-infested lands in order to rescue her sister Swan. With the evil force’s tyrannical grasp on the island, it’s up to Wren to brandish her katana and bring peace back to the land.

title: A Butterfly
summary:
A butterfly wants to cross all gates till the end of the world!
It is a beautiful, lonely, firm butterfly, die for trying! But it never gives up!
This is a one tap arcade game. Reflex is the key and time is more important.
Lots of beautiful butterflies can be unlocked.
Anime music and Movie graphics.

title: 101 Cats Hidden in Bangkok
summary: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Bangkok landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

title: Legends of Savvarah: Children of the Sun
summary: A fantasy interactive story (visual novel) where the mysteries of ancient gods, enigmas of bygone eras, magic, and the complex relationships between various beings are intricately woven together.

title: Dragon Takers
summary: "Rise, those who resist the dragons—"

title: Guud Dawg!
summary: Embark on a goofy, chaotic adventure as a dog, dodging wacky enemies through a maze of mayhem, all while carrying out your owner's wishes.

title: Knight's Night!
summary: Knight's Night! is a retro-style 1-bit platformer. Collect items, unlock new abilities, and make your way into the evil wizard's castle to save the kingdom!

title: Farmyard Pals Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: Experience the charm of farm life with Farmyard Pals Jigsaw Puzzles! Piece together delightful scenes of cows, chickens, and playful piglets in vibrant rural settings. With customizable difficulty and beautifully hand-drawn puzzles, it’s the perfect relaxing escape for puzzle lovers of all ages.

title: The Auto Sort Is Broken
summary: Set in a universe parodying poorly managed MMORPGs, even the inventory sort feature has stopped working. It's now up to you to organize the players' messy bags and handle their occasional complaints.

title: Kick the Boss's Ass
summary: Collect items and defeat the annoying boss!

title: Numbers Destiny
summary: Welcome to this game, where you'll experience the deep strategy hidden behind simple operations in this number puzzle game. This is an easy-to-start but hard-to-master puzzle game suitable for players of all ages.

title: Mysterious Mystery, EP 1: The Duo Dilemma
summary: Mysterious Mystery is a fully voiced mystery visual novel centered around the detective duo, Justin and Dakota. Solve multiple cases using Dakota's evidence gathering abilities and Justin's expert interrogation. Discover outlandish cases, meet unique characters, and become world class detectives.

title: A Very Merry Nightmare
summary: A First-Person 3D Christmas Thriller Game

title: Sweet Massage
summary: Sweet Massage - A simple and beautiful puzzle game based on the theme of a massage center. Five technician girls serve customers in different ways. There is relaxing music accompaniment. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girls' photos in the gallery.

title: Virtual Love Secrets
summary: A visual novel a little unusual, which not only the decisions you make change the course, but each game will be personal.

title: Divine Legacy: Neo Amburia
summary: Divine Legacy: Neo Amburia is a medieval-fantasy RPG where a young woman must save her childhood friend, who's been pulled toward a dark fate. With little more than determination, she'll battle powerful foes, form unexpected alliances, and uncover secrets that could reshape the world.

title: Exterminators of Saturn
summary: A top down, twin stick shooter inspired by classic retro arcade games with loads of enemies, fast paced bullet hell combat, big boss battles and tons of weapon customizations.

title: The Alchemist & His Battle-Scarred Homunculus
summary:
A heartwarming tale of two broken people finding a new life together!

This heartwarming and dramatic tale follows Rakels, the young alchemist who helped create living homunculi to better the lives of mankind, only to have his partner betray him and turn their creations into tools of war. After years of exile for speaking out against their use as weapons during the war, Rakels discovers the battered form of Mel, a homunculus who was discarded by a slave trader.

As the two begin to confront their traumatic pasts together, a new bond is formed that helps them heal and forge a loving future together. Sweet and tender moments abound as Rakels and Mel face their fears of society and intimacy to truly come together as a couple.

title: Spell of Infinity
summary: Play for Free !! Enter the world of swords and magic now. Team up with your friends in the fantasy world of your dreams, strategically select your heroes, and conquer your enemies.

title: Ämäränth: The Last Day of My Adolescence
summary: The story of a young graduate witnessing the twilight of his world.

title: Retro Endurance 8bit
summary: Retro Endurance 8bit is a retro game collection of 30 classic retro style games that delivers inventive reimagining of NES classics with a fun rapid-fire shuffler style gameplay with some modern twists, helping you to relive your nostalgic memories. Also contains an arcade mode and daily challenges.

title: Supermarket Bash
summary: This is a happy and tense weekend. The rush to buy in the supermarket has quietly begun. As a member of this family, are you ready to contribute to this carnival?

title: Scary World
summary:
You are about to see a scary world.

Your goal is to survive just ten minutes in this bouncy, bumpy, dynamic and surprising bullet heaven. Inspired by Vampire Survivors.

title: StompyBoy
summary: Pilot a big stompy mech, and shoot other big stompy mechs with your various lasers. That's about it.

title: Diamond Thief
summary: Diamond Thief is an arcade 2d platform game. This game is a kind of Manic miner released in the 80s on ZX Spectrum and Amstrad CPC.

title: The Short Trip
summary: The Short Trip is a game about driving and surviving in an endless desert along a somewhat-long almost-short road.

title: Arena of Faith
summary: Win,Team up,Get Rewards and become the eSports King in Arena of Faith.

title: Goddess Of Swing
summary: A Highscore Chaser game, made from german group of students.

title: Mercenaries Lament: Requiem of the Silver Wolf
summary: Mercenaries Lament is a tactical simulation RPG set in a fantasy world.

title: Astro Defender
summary: Defend Zytherion in frantic battles against alien hordes! In Astro Defender, pilot the legendary Zenith-01 and face a galactic threat in a fast-paced action-platformer. Will you be the galaxy's last hope?

title: Farmer's Shop Simulator
summary: Create your own farm. Harvest crops, take care of animals, sell goods, set prices at your discretion, hire staff, expand, design, and build your dream farm.

title: Rusty Dudes
summary: Assemble a team to complete various missions, while fighting off hordes of freaks. In your will be available two dozen unique mercenaries with different skills. Combine them at your discretion.

title: Hentai Sally
summary: Sally is a seductive girl who loves the farm and adventures. Are you ready to uncover all her secrets?

title: Code Alkonost: Awakening of Evil
summary: Code Alkonost is a first-person story-rich, atmospheric survival horror adventure game inspired by Slavic mythology. Travel through a dark fantasy world and encounter the possessive spirits and illusions of the underworld. Experience authentic art style and stories never before seen in horror games.

title: Skills and Slimes
summary: Slay slimes and save humanity!

title: Triptych Book I: Blockhead
summary: Triptych Book I: Blockhead is a graphical adventure set in an alternate version of World War One with simple point and click interface, easy to use controls & rip-roaring adventure in the skies!

title: The Outer Side
summary: Explore an abandoned black-n-white world, utilize your abilities to fight danger, and find the truth about this place.

title: Venus in Furs: Sensual Pleasure
summary: Hardpunch's Venus is alone in her temple of love, pleasure, and sex. She knows that the world we know no longer exists. Now, she remains a recluse in her palace and anyone who dares to steal her precious gifts will be punished with explicit and savage sex. This invader will become her sex slave...

title: ATC Flight Operator
summary: ATC Flight Operator is an air traffic control simulation engine with a powerful interface that gives users complete control of their airspace. Are you capable of taking control of an iconic airport while preventing mid-air collisions, and still directing airplanes to land as quickly as possible?

title: Sungka
summary: A relaxing digital adaptation of the traditional Filipino mancala game, Sungka challenges players to strategize, plan their moves, and outsmart their opponents while collecting shells in this timeless classic.

title: The Shell Part III: Paradiso
summary:
The coiling chains of obsession that began with The Shell now threaten to strangle Detective Reiji Tokisaka in the third and final entry in the trilogy. As old friends and foes rise up for one last confrontation, can anyone break the cycle—and can Reiji's heart ever be set free?

(This version is the censored Steam release of The Shell Part III: Paradiso)

title: AI2U: With You 'Til The End
summary:
Cute catgirl Eddie, pretty witch Elysia, and stunning AI hologram Estelle all seem to adore you—perhaps to a fault! Learn what makes them tick by exploring their homes and talking to them about nearly anything.

An overarching storyline looms over your adventures together, connecting your narrative to the dynamic NPCs. Solve puzzles and unravel mysteries alongside your lethally charming companions.

Your words and actions shape the outcome of each round, with a variety of endings waiting at the end of each playthrough. Strategize to unlock the best outcome and whisk your captors away!

title: The Little Adventure
summary: A brave dog from a distant planet embarks on a perilous journey through a beautiful yet dangerous world in search of an old friend. Face intense battles, explore breathtaking landscapes, and uncover hidden secrets in this action-packed adventure filled with heartwarming moments and deep connections.

title: None Shall Intrude
summary: Venture into None Shall Intrude, a roguelite deck-builder with tile-based combat where you become a powerful Raid Boss. Epic battles, intricate strategies, and the ever-present threat of heroic challengers seeking to vanquish your reign. Will you conquer all or fall to valiant heroes?

title: Dog Walking Adventures
summary: Dog Walking Adventures invites players into a cozy casual experience where the simple joys of walking with a canine companion become an adventure in itself. Walk around and explore immersive environments, all while playing with your dog, completing quests and collecting items.

title: Fell in love with the Nobility girl As a member of the rebel organization
summary: The Kingdom of Caeser is facing internal and external difficulties. As the captain of the rebel army, I met Cosgray, the daughter of the Duke who was loyal to the Kingdom of Caeser, at this time. In my interactions with her, she has become increasingly unforgettable to me.

title: Slime Climb
summary: A terrible storm has compromised the alchemist's tower. This is your chance! Jump, glide, and bounce your way through 20+ stages to get out at the top! The other slimes got stuck though, so don't leave them behind!

title: 1000 Missiles: Defense of Tornwa
summary: Missile Defense Game: Protect Your Country The enemy will employ various strategies to breach your defenses. Stay adaptable to survive. Defend Your Nation: Use strategic placement and upgrades of your AA systems to fend off relentless missile attacks and protect your country.

title: Tablets of Power
summary: JRPG w/ modern humor, turn-based combat, intricate plot twists and a world filled with puzzles, exploration and conspiracy theories.

title: Waifu Simulator: Latex Edition
summary: Waifu Simulator is a simulation game whose ultimate goal is to bring you pleasure and relaxation!

title: Astro Arena

title: Runet Legend

Exciting adventures, secrets of the past and difficult decisions are waiting for you. Control the fate of Ozon671Games and help him figure out this difficult situation.

title: Rust of Steel
summary: "Rust of Steel" is a post-apocalyptic ruins exploration RPG with a high degree of freedom. Take on the world in your own style with multiple scenarios, free stat distribution, and the option to play as the good guy or the bad guy!

title: Transcontinental

Playing as an urban ninja, much of the platforming is parkour-influenced as players will be making use of the environment with the urban ninja’s (slightly over-exaggerated) realistic jumping abilities.

title: Super Arter

Super Arter is a puzzle/platform game inspired by the Mario vs Donkey Kong, with an emphasis on pick up the key to take to the door solving puzzles. Featuring pixel art inspired by 16bits games.

Jump, throw objects, use switches, dodge traps, defeat enemies and much more to overcome the obstacles in your path, while looking for the key to open the door to the next level, and free your way until you face the boss of each world to collect all Domino Relics.

-Solve various puzzles in up to 5 different worlds with many stages.

-Face a powerful boss at the end of each world

Recover the Domino Relics stolen by the Dark Wizard, solving the most challenging puzzles, facing enemies, collecting gifts, and discovering the best way for Arter to take the key to the door, in this Puzzle/Platform game.

title: Lonely Christmas: Cupid's Punishment
summary: Santa has ordered one of her helpers, Cupid, to punish you. However, the "punishment" that Cupid has in mind for you is far from painful

title: A Simple Garbage Sorting Game

You will take on the role of brave explorers, venturing through mysterious realms filled with magic, mythical creatures, and ancient secrets. Choose your hero, be it a powerful mage, a skilled warrior, or a cunning rogue. Complete quests, defeat formidable enemies, and uncover hidden treasures while shaping your own destiny.

title: Unknown Hero

A collection of 33 new levels for Doom II, ranging from sprawling shootouts to claustrophobic challenge maps.

Designed for both single player and cooperative modes.

There's one brand new enemy, and a new final boss, but otherwise the gameplay is just like Classic Doom.

In this eerie supernatural dimension, you meet Izuna, who claims to be a great yokai with a fondness for humans. Can you escape this otherworldly realm, with the help of Izuna and the Kosaka sisters' spiritual powers?

summary: Fold your way through mindspinning puzzles

Things get heated quickly, soon it’s the queen’s hole enjoys the slave’s shaft. It all ends with a well-deserved bath of monster cum!

BattleHeights is a multiplayer party game combining elements of aerial combat, fantasy, and physics-based mechanics.

Players engage in matches across floating maps, using abilities like double jumps, grappling hooks, and wind spells to outmaneuver and outwit their opponents. The gameplay revolves around creative movement, strategic use of terrain, and team-based objectives in modes like King of the Hill, Team Deathmatch and other fun activities, like a Grappling Race.

The game features cartoony physics, emphasizing fun and laughter over competitive intensity.

title: Aure

title: Ultimate Barbarian

A 2D top down retro action game with roguelike and RPG elements. You are a barbarian looking for glory, trying to defeat an absolutly tyrannic king and take his thrown. You'll have to train yourself in a dangerous world, find gold through quests to get better weapons and potions, explore many locations like taverns and dungeons. 
 
The gameplay is mainly built around bloody melee fight against enemies, like arena fighters and random encouters on the world map, looters, slavers, goblins and lizardmen. You'll be able so recruit warrios to fight along with you, improve you barbarian stats with each level, collect man items, scrolls and potions et learn new fighting skills from  masters. 
 
The game is currently available on itch.io, in early access. Most features are already in, and many are coming. There is a small scenario tutorial to learn how to play. 
 
Surviving is hard, skilled enemies have no mercy, expect to die often, and retry !

title: Fragrance Point
summary: What went wrong on Fragrance Point? Explore, hang out, and poke around where you're not supposed to.

title: Check Inn
summary: Build hotels, accommodate guests and expand your hotel business throughout the world!

title: Stock Exchange Game
summary: Stock Market Game Involving Trading on Commodity Exchanges for Beginner Traders

title: Sweet Tavern

If your talent and skill are sharp enough, you may be in with a shot of winning the Wandering Merchant Quest and proving that YOU are the best dealer in town!

Create a strategy for your opponent and purchase their farm. Pay attention to the mines while making your attack!

title: Malleus Cocconum: The Heiress

The dark side of elitism awaited. Humanity or demonic nature? Love or desire? Your choices would determine her fate.

From the dead to werewolves and demons. Go to forests and abandoned cities and clear the places from the undead. Can you defeat them all?

title: Tenshi

You are Leonard Nimby; stone-faced agent of IM5, hot on the trail of a shrink gun stolen from you by a villanous mayoral candidate on the eve of a fateful election.

title: Phantom's Estate

title: Chicken Hill

title: Warranty Not Included

title: SickWay VR
