You can use your creative abilities in track editor, or you can become the fastest among your friends in multiplayer maps.

title: Aisera's Ladder
summary: Come and experience the fast and exciting cold weapon battles! Understand the vast world of Azeroth in battle; By using exquisite combat skills to defeat the weak, managing a farm to produce food, and running a tavern to accumulate gold coins and upgrade equipment.

title: Bear Jump
summary: Step into the bouncy world of Bear Jump! Help a determined bear jump endlessly upward, dodging obstacles, collecting power-ups, and reaching new heights. With intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, Bear Jump is easy to pick up but challenging to master.

title: Ninth Hotel
summary: You are trapped in a Hotel by accident Find out all the signs of abnormality in the hallway Escape by going down to the first floor while carefully observing your surroundings

title: Jailbreak Assault
summary: In Jailbreak Assault, you're a prisoner on a daring mission to break free. Start with a key and a baton, outwit guards, destroy documents, and disable security systems. Arm yourself for the ultimate challenge: escaping the heavily fortified perimeter.

title: Relentless Expanse
summary: Capture and upgrade planets, outsmart your enemies, and conquer the galaxy! Simple yet addicting, you can play alone or outsmart your friends in this 2D top-down space RTS. Completely free, no monetization, just fun!

title: Popo & Rob
summary: Popo & Rob is an action-packed shooter game that combines dynamic, casual-friendly shooting with a unique twist on movement. Engage in exciting battles where gravity is no limit. Choose your side, Popo or Rob, and immerse yourself in a world that’s bright, bold, and brimming with fun.

title: Prison Notes
summary: Prison Notes is a RPG with text-based ADV and cultivation elements. You act as a young migrant worker, wrongly imprisoned in the prison known as "The Coral Reef".What challenges and adventures are awaiting? Will you finally find a way out? Your choices and actions will decide the end of your story.

title: Templar
summary: A gun wielding Templar purifies a forsaken church.

title: Super Pump
summary: Super Pump is a one-button runner game about an old man chasing his dog. Test your timing, focus and anticipation skills as you toggle oncoming hazards to survive. Short but sweet - this game is easy to learn but hard to master.

title: Enerdusk
summary: "Enerdusk" is a roguelike deck-building game where you develop strategies centered on units while utilizing cards. Decks and items empower your units, and in turn, your units enhance your deck and shift the battle in your favor. Master this synergy to dominate all your enemies.

title: Whispers in the Wood
summary: Whispers in the Forest is a single-player base defense strategy game where you must build, upgrade, and defend your base against demonic creatures in a cursed forest. Manage your resources, lead your troops, and survive the darkness of the night as you fight to protect your only hope for salvation.

title: Game of Fate 2: A Century's Promise
summary: Transported back a century by fate, you find yourself in a legendary tale of vengeance. Amidst powerful enemies in a tumultuous era, your mission is to assist those around you. Experience this immersive epic from a first-person perspective—authentic, weighty, yet brimming with hope.

title: YieldTrillions
summary: Hello, I'm a corn alien, I need to start the ship and go home, please V I have 10000000000 pounds of corn for spaceship fuel and I'll give you half a pound of popcorn as a reward when I get home.

title: Save The Castle!
summary: Save the Castle is an action packed VR tower defense that places you on the field of battle. Build your army, take over any tower and turn the tide of the war!

title: Whack Mole
summary: The player gets ready to face moles popping up from various holes. As the game advances, the speed and frequency of the moles' appearances increase, challenging the player's reflexes and hand-eye coordination.

title: Orbital Cascade
summary: A puzzle game inspired by classics like Zuma, where you pop colorful bullets, unleash dazzling combos, and rise to conquer the skies. Strategize your moves, master the challenge, and claim victory!

title: Strigoi
summary:
"We, my sister and I, have long lived abroad, together with the longing for our homeland. Not long ago, we received an invitation to a party in Romania, in the Carpathians. My sister, without hesitation, got into the car and left. I refused to go, but after some time I received a terrifying message from my sister. Frightened, I dropped everything and quickly set out to find her. I wonder what happened?"

Strigoi is a first-person horror shooter set in the Carpathian Mountains. You will face various enemies (Vampires, Strigoi...), encounter interesting puzzles, and find different items that will help you overcome obstacles and enemies.

title: Aleator
summary: Can Debt-laden gamblers grab at straws and escape, or plunge into a bottomless pit

title: Nagi no Koi
summary: A Japanese-style visual novel where two stories intersect.

title: Jigsaw USA
summary: Jigsaw USA is an exciting puzzle game that challenges players to complete puzzles as quickly as possible to earn top scores. Compete with players worldwide to achieve the fastest completion times and secure your place at the top of the global leaderboards. As players race against the clock, they also get to explore iconic moments, notable figures, and landmarks from American history, making the game both thrilling and educational.

title: Willie's Nightfall
summary: Willie's Nightfall is a first-person horror game. Explore the eerie offices of Willie's Company in search of secret documents. But you're not alone. The sinister company mascot, Willie—a distorted, murderous mouse—is hunting you down.

title: Edd-E
summary: Edd-E is a pixel-art game maker with custom visual scripting and publishing platform. Create games and Publish them with just one click. Play games from other creators or edit them. Learn programming and game development!

title: CroquettesClicker
summary: An incremental game about kibble and cats! Collect, upgrade, and manage your kibble to reach unimaginable heights. Will you become the ultimate kibble master?

title: Freeky Faucets Arcade
summary: In Freeky Faucets, you play as these round beetle bugs called Boogas. The Faucets have invaded ally grounds! Eeeyikes! Don't worry hero, Faucet Friend will assist! (for a price). Discover his comrades too!

title: The Witch's Assistant
summary: A sexually explicit visual novel in which the player assists a Witch to run her potion selling business.

title: Internet Cafe Simulator 2025
summary: Run your own internet café! Manage, upgrade, and customise every detail to create the ultimate hangout in this immersive first-person simulation.

title: Personal Finance Simulator
summary: Choose how much money you start with, a profession, and a city, then make personal financial decisions! Will you end up rich or end up getting evicted?

title: The Dream Within
summary: A pixel-graphics open world survival craft RPG, where players are locked in a deep dream world, survive and rescue yourself in this unstable world, forage, hunt, mine, and build up shelters. Find a way to escape.

title: Paranormal Night Shift
summary: Paranormal Night Shift is an observation and spot the anomaly game set in a haunted house in the 1980s.

title: Nine-Ball Roulette
summary: This will be the most exciting pool game you have ever played. Join up to 3 of your friends in this exciting pool roulette game! Eliminate each other with pool until only one person is left.

title: Constantine Scores
summary: Constantine Scores is a single-player heisting Sci-fi First Person Shooter. Upgrade your arsenal to gain more abilities, weapons, and perks to keep the playing field equal. Fight against three separate factions, spanning multiple contracts, and randomized multi-day campaigns.https://

title: Sword of Jade: Parallel Dreams
summary:
An RPG made in OHRRPGCE.

After his fall from grace from the group that calls themselves "Protectors", Dogero questions his role in society. Ready to accept defeat, he is confronted by a long lost friend, who inspires him to keep his dreams alive.

title: Confluence: An Of Sense and Soul Soliloquy
summary: A poet ponders queer life and love after his happily ever after.

title: Crimson Rite
summary: In times of peace, a lone wanderer decides to camp for the night. He faces an unexpected attack from an orc. Trying to find out why he has been kidnapped, then learns the dark history of an outcast orc tribe. You must escape before the Crimson Rite.

title: Threefold Recital
summary: Threefold Recital is set in an oriental fantasy world where the metropolis of Bluescales faces turmoil after a long golden age. The mix of magic, modern, and ancient technologies challenges governance, while tensions between humans, beastlings, and dragons grow. In the shadows, a crisis looms. A 2D platformer with puzzles.

title: Ultimate Pain
summary: Ultimate Pain (UP) is wild, sock-blasting journey of non-stop jumping madness! We’re not sure if you’ll love it or scream in agony, but it’s packed with epic leaps, chaotic surprises, and gravity-defying pain. Get ready to jump UP, fall down, and laugh the whole way!

title: Transfusion
summary:
Transfusion plunges you into a world originally created in 1997 by Monolith Productions. Created with the BUILD game engine (Duke Nukem, Shadow Warrior), Blood was a tour de force of horror that has yet to be matched, in which you battled minions of evil in a lightning-paced, blood splattered quest for glory.

Thrill to new, enhanced special effects not seen in the original as you guide Caleb along his gory quest through a 3-dimensional world of horror. But the fun is just beginning then…

When Tchernobog’s Cabal has fallen, there’s millions of challengers vying for your throne out there in cyberspace. Be sure to hone your skills against the enhanced FrikBots before defending your title in online bloodbaths. No need for Caleb to do all the work either - you can battle online as any identity you choose by selecting from the character library or by downloading new identities from the internet.

title: TrickShot Simulator
summary:
This Game is a simulator game.
A player experiences realistic trickshot challenges.

title: Lern Island Letters
summary: Lern Island Letters is a short narrative game where you play as a postman, sorting the mail of the five intriguing residents of a remote island. Pick up on their peculiar habits through hints on the envelopes, discover their secrets, and try to save this peaceful haven from its fate.

title: Dreaming Isles
summary: A colorful sandbox action RPG and life sim that combines sword and sorcery, high seas adventure, farming, and relationship building. Unite the clans of the Dreaming Isles, farm the land, start a family, and find your purpose.

title: Deadbeat
summary: Make your voice heard in this isometric Action-RPG where quick thinking and patience guide the way to victory. In a hazy Hereafter that's not heaven or hell, fight bizarre demons, call your friends, and explore the deepest reaches of death.

title: Super Puzzled Cat
summary: Help Puzzled Cat use jetpacks, portals, bombs, gum, and more to conquer treacherous platforming stages. Play your own way using save states to explore a world full of challenges and secrets - but can you find the way through? Travel through time and space and reach enlightenment.

title: Elohim Eternal: Exodus
summary: Overthrow the corrupt emissary of the Kingdom of Heaven in this turn-based RPG with visual novel storytelling. This free game takes place a thousand years before the events of Elohim Eternal: The Babel Code. Before the Idinites and Cainites, there were the Misru and Simru, based on ancient Egypt.

title: Nurikabe World
summary: Nurikabe World is a relaxing logic puzzle game where you solve puzzles by creating islands and connecting rivers to create beautiful sceneries. Experience different landscapes and seasons, solve puzzle campaigns and create your own levels.

title: RunieStory
summary: Befriend locals, romance a girl, or even go on an adventure for money for gifts! An action RPG inspired by Stardew Valley and Rune Factory where you befriend or romance townsfolk or go explore dungeons. There is a lot of things to do such as farming, cooking and hunting! The main goal is to get married and get to know everyone the exploring dungeons.

title: Abyssal Shade
summary: Abyssal Shade is a deck building roguelike where you dive into a dungeon of the mind. Receives the blessings of your emotions through unique puzzles and expand your deck to protect yourself from the Shades.

title: Eternal Night Glory
summary: From the beginning, you've got all the cards. Now, command the garrisons of the Gate of Radiance to stop them from approaching.

title: A Place Far Away
summary: After the catastrophe that almost decimated humanity, Anya and her father Caledon can only rely on each other to survive. Embark on a journey of self-discovery, love, friendship and purpose in A Place Far Away.

title: Dim
summary: Dim, a wandering soul whose light is constantly fading, must use the various abilities it possesses to traverse the dark and dangerous world surrounding it. Jumping through platforms and other dangers, the player must guide this lost soul through the darkness before its light runs out.

title: Rake Remastered
summary: Survive the pursuit of a monstrous predator in "Rake Remastered," a tribute to the 2015 original. Uncover mysteries armed with traps and cameras. Outsmart the Rake, survive the nightmare.

title: Universe Horizon
summary: An idle incremental game where you decide to travel across the whole Universe. Embark on this journey in your little ship and get as far away as possible from Earth, gathering resources and upgrading your spaceship along the way.

title: Toy Shop Simulator
summary: Run your own toy store! Arrange shelves, set prices, process payments, and manage staff. Expand and design your shop, handle online orders, deliver with a scooter, trade rare toys, and ensure security. Create a magical shopping experience in Toy Shop Simulator!

title: Greybit
summary: Greybit is a heart-pounding, adrenaline-fueled first-person shooter (FPS) game paying homage to the iconic 1993 "Doom" while adding a fresh twist. Play as a lone warrior battling hordes of demons in a nightmarish landscape where every corner hides a new threat.

title: Gummy Jump 2
summary: You just emerged from the depths of the colossal machine, only to find that its vastness far exceeds your wildest imagination. The metallic walls tower over you, casting long shadows that shift ominously as you explore your surroundings. As you take in the intricate machinery around you

title: Salvo Subs
summary: Destroy your friends online in Salvo Subs, a retro inspired top-down shooter. Unlock 32 submarine vessels in 10+ arena game modes.

title: How to Build a Flying City
summary: When tasked to build a flying city, it's up to you to rake in all the money you'll need! Recruit travelers and adventurers to help your city flourish!

title: Elemental Surge
summary: A challenging action platformer in which players embark on an epic journey fighting their way to the top of towering castle to confront a once-mighty but fallen king. Immerse yourself in an experience filled adventure, danger, and magic!

title: FoxRun
summary: FoxRun is the result of a novice trying to make a game in a limited amount of time and now released on Steam for the pleasure of everyone. In FoxRun you are a fox that runs. Collect the coins for score or eat the burgers to regain life. Look out for the birds because they will kill you

title: Moon Tower
summary: Play as a mechanical being, defeat all enemies, and retrieve the crucial item. Moon Tower is a fast-paced game where you must constantly dodge enemies and eliminate them within each room. Gain different abilities to strengthen yourself and enhance your power.

title: The Tale of: Bubble Boy
summary: Help Bubble Boy reach the highest mountaintop in the Alps by moving him upwards inside his giant soap bubble, but don't let the bubble pop, or you will fall, all the way, back down...

title: Zombies & Survivors
summary: Embark on a top-down adventure in a sprawling open world. Battle hordes of zombies, rescue desperate survivors, and uncover the secrets lurking in the farthest reaches of this dystopian wasteland.

title: Silent Signals
summary: Hack the System. Uncover the Truth

title: The Shadow Over Cyberspace
summary: Dread whispers echo across the Information Superhighway. Y2K is coming, heralding the rise of the Old Ones. With your meatspace mind unraveling, time is running out -- barter with gods, embrace the deathless aeons, or go offline permanently in this modempunk horror story.

title: Ship of Love
summary: Ship of Love - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

title: Hellfire Rampage VR
summary: HELLFIRE RAMPAGE is a thrilling VR adventure where you, as the inventor of teleportation, hunt for crystal essences to unlock a portal to dangerous dungeons. Battle hellish creatures using a vast arsenal of interdimensional weapons. Unique combat mechanics and challenges are awaiting!

title: Ball Race Party
summary: Ball Race Party is a game where you race against time or other players with your physical ball. You can play single player or multiplayer.

title: Vysions
summary: Welcome to Vysions, a world made of dreams, where puzzles are truth and you must bring meaning to their madness.

title: The Unlife of Gorlak
summary: The Unlife of Gorlak is an RPG Where you play as a dragon who died but got better (or is at least trying to). You have been resurrected as a skeletal dragon by a necromancer. As you returned to the living world you felt the presence of the hero who had slain you has given chase. You have one month to prepare for his arrival so you can tell him how you really feel about him!

title: Terror Diversion
summary: A text-based horror game in which you investigate mysterious urban legends. Along the way, the player takes on the role of a character who gets “lost” and encounters a series of random events.

title: The Other Me
summary: The Other Me is a first-person psychological horror game delving into the realms of horror that prowl the recesses of one's psyche. Pursue the dread ruminations amidst the maelstrom of the Asylum. This game offers both mind-bending horror elements and realistic environments.

title: Unless
summary: Take a trip back to the nostalgic era of platforming games built without gimmicks or a story. Race through bite-sized levels solo, or with a co-op helper to get the best time among your friends, or maybe even the world!

title: Base Blitz
summary: Two teams battle it out in a high-stakes capture-the-flag competition. Set on resource-filled battlegrounds, each team must protect their base while devising strategies to infiltrate the enemy's. Your flag is perched on the roof of your base just out of enemy reach, but so is theirs. The only way in? Tear down their walls by gathering resources, crafting items such as pickaxes, bombs and cannons, and launch a full-scale blitz!

title: Survivor Challenge TD
summary: Survivor Challenge TD plunges you into an epic struggle for survival against an oncoming horde of monsters. Arm yourself with the most formidable and thrilling weapon combinations and abilities as you brace for an ultimate showdown against a powerful boss!

title: Your Android
summary: Your life is changed forever when a mysterious package arrives at your front door. Go on many different outings with your new android companion as you both form unforgettable memories in this beautiful visual novel.

title: Hop 'n' Marty
summary: Hop 'n' Marty is a retro 3D platformer for the modern age. Journey through sprawling worlds to find all of the collectables and meet the eccentric inhabitants within. Rescue the captured pygmies who have been trapped in cages and bring them back to safety.

title: Checkout: Cashier Simulator
summary: Checkout is a cute point-and-click pixel art cashier simulation game. Work shifts throughout the year and seasons, earn as many points as you can within each shift's time limit, and get to know your coworkers.

title: The Redundant
summary: Step into the metallic boots of an abandoned robot and fight back against an army of virus-infected machines. Sneak or battle your way around the facility, uncover its secrets, and isolate each section from the network - before it's too late...

title: Defenders of the Dune
summary: Defenders of the Dune is a game about overcoming the wilderness and establishing a kingdom in defiance of the land itself. Players will fight to survive each day, experiencing the challenge and pride that comes with building up their base against all odds

title: Sleembo
summary: Help Bo wake up! Control ragdoll physics in freefall, collect fragments, avoid obstacles from her subconscious, and open the awakening portals. Unique biomes, mini-games, beautiful music, and the magical dream atmosphere await you!

title: A Marble's Muse
summary: Will you be able to find love and create art in Liliana, a colorful land full of marbles?

title: Golfslinger
summary:
An explosive mix of golf and shooting! Use a varied arsenal to launch your ball into a frantic multiplayer chaos!

Be the world best in the racing solo races or face off against up to 12 players in stylized Westernpunk environments and prove you're the best of the Golfslingers!

A game made for tryharder and having fun with your friends !

title: Durak Online
summary: Fast-paced, strategic card game, playable with 2 - 6 players or 1 - 3 bots!

title: Routine Soul
summary: An RPG adventure game with Souls-like style. It features free exploration in a vast world, turn-based battles, collections of various equipment and skills, multiple endings and playthroughs. Under its magnificent and fantastical plot, there are countless Easter eggs and surprises hidden.

title: Pawn Shop: Simulator
summary: Pawn Shop Simulator is an exciting simulation game where you take on the role of a pawn shop owner. Your mission is to manage your inventory, negotiate prices with customers, and grow your business.

title: Red Blue Cell
summary: This is a retro barrage flying shooting game. Drive a space fighter plane, shuttle between planets and space stations, and use powerful firepower to destroy enemy space battleships!

title: Mystic Rest Stop
summary: Welcome to your new summer job. Arthur Brooks, a 22 year old, starts a night job at Moon Gas Station. As he settles in, he experiences strange events that unsettle him. The urban legends about the gas station seem to come to life. Dealing with customers at night is deeply unsettling.

title: PiMon
summary: PiMon are virtual pets that live right on your PC! Take care of your PiMon while you do your daily tasks. Train them, update them into new forms, raise PiMon together or battle with your friends. Or do none of that and raise your PiMon your way! Welcome Admin, what kind of PiMon will you raise?

title: Nature Atelier
summary: A decorative design game where you can create with natural specimens. There are no rules or limitations—unleash your imagination and craft your own masterpiece!

title: MyPawnShop
summary:
Have you always dreamed of running your own pawn shop? Now it's possible with MyPawnShop!

You can buy and sell hundreds of items of many different types. Musical instruments, weapons, art objects and much more!

Become rich by negotiating with your customers when buying and selling.

Clean and repair your items to earn even more money, with different tools at your disposal (found at different vendors in the game).

Manage your store as you wish with different storage units available as well as your storage reserve to temporarily store your items to be repaired or cleaned.

title: TeeDee
summary: A minimalist 2D tower defense game with 3 towers, 6 maps, and 4 monster types. Simple, fun, and perfect for quick strategy sessions!

title: Bright Side: Quiz
summary: Compete with family and friends to uncover the ultimate quiz champion!

title: Elemental Defender
summary: Elemental Defender is a tower defense game using card to power up your units. Build your deck and place powerful units to defend your base from passing enemies.

title: Terrarium
summary: Cozy fires, books, and tiny glass bottles filled with endless possibilities. In Terrarium, make your vision a reality and craft the cozy dioramas you've always dreamed of. The only question is, what will you build first?

title: Witch Stories
summary: First-person retro horror RPG. Non-linear, open world, branching dialog, voice acted, simple controls, and tons of easter eggs to discover. Set in the 1700s. You are a woman living in a cottage in the forest with your husband and newborn baby. Your story unfolds over two days, whether you choose to act or not.

title: Cam Star!
summary: Board an experimental space station orbiting Earth, and help Lexie earn money to unlock new scenes to show her fans!

title: Hentai World Winter
summary: This is an engaging game featuring stunning and charming girls. Dive into the jigsaw puzzle mechanics, arranging pieces to unveil the complete image of these captivating characters.

title: Krashimals
summary: Krashimals is a chaotic, physics-driven party game where you play as adorable animals and crash into friends for ultimate mayhem! Smash through stylized arenas, challenge modes, use power-ups, and enjoy the fun. Customize your Krashimals hats, karts and wheels and battle to be the last one standing!

title: Freedom Maker
summary: Seek freedom and build an infinite deck. In a cyberpunk future, use strategy and skill to overthrow AI's domination. Freedom Maker is a unique RPG blending puzzles and action.

title: Sixteen Undead
summary: Drive Like Hell! A high-octane chase through the endless desert! Dodge cops, rock out and tear up the road as a stitched-up teenage Frankenstein!

title: Coffee Express
summary: Open your own coffee shop and become a barista in the cozy and colorful world of Coffee Express! A unique experience awaits you with stock tracking, realistic coffee making experience and shop customizations. Make your customers happy by making excellent coffee in your own coffee paradise!

title: Dumb Castle
summary: The Dumb Castle is just made to bully players! Jump into the castle with your friends and get bullied by the various maps and levels waiting for you with some horror elements!

title: Detective Mikami
summary: The outbreak has hit the entire world like a truck. Yet, in some respects, the infestation of the population has affected Mikami and Hirano the most. That is because the two of them are so unlike one another yet they are stuck together, trying to live through this new, dangerous world.

title: Starship Coaster
summary: Surf the black holes to high scores! Steer your rocket away from crazy arcade cosmic dangers and try to be the fastest, survive the longest, or get as much points as you can. Space is hard, be prepared!

title: The Wungo Dungo Surprise
summary: The Wungo Dungo Surprise is a physics based local 1v1 fighting game, with no combos or roster, just 1 simple enemy to beat repeatedly. The main moves are punching, kicking and dodging, and some extra tools, a few weapons and powers.

title: The Line of Defense
summary: Prepare for an epic battle to defend your mystical swamplands from the invasion of three ruthless kings!

title: Super Star Shooter Classic
summary: "Super Star Shooter" is a classic vertical-scrolling shooter game that combines nostalgic pixel art and high-speed combat. Control your spaceship and save the galaxy by defeating enemies one after another!

title: The Rise of the Hero
summary: The game world is in chaos, and only by reuniting every piece of the crystal can balance and peace be restored.

title: Nexus Knights
summary: In "Nexus Knights," players embark on an exhilarating journey through time and dimensions, battling against the forces of chaos to preserve the stability of the universe. As Nexus Knights, they must hone their skills, forge alliances, and unravel the secrets of the multiverse.

title: Shujinkou
summary:
A retired samurai (主) is entrusted with saving his home from intelligent, language-devouring "Akuma" alongside an eccentric fox (人) freed from a cursed abode and an astute princess (公) with her own ambitions.

Shujinkou is a dungeon-crawling JRPG that offers a unique opportunity to learn Japanese as you play. It features thousands of Japanese words, phrases, kana, kanji, and grammar elements that players can master through focus, diligence, and consistency. The language content spans from JLPT N5 to N1 standards, accommodating learners at any stage.

However, learning Japanese is entirely optional. For those more interested in the adventure, Shujinkou delivers a rich JRPG experience. Players can immerse themselves in hundreds of skills, items, deep forging, cooking, fishing, quests, achievements, records to break, and minigames.

title: Penguin Panic!
summary: A penguin's life is never easy. Even more so when you're a penguin mother, looking to protect her eggs. Penguin Panic is a cute platformer and features simple controls, secret challenges and cheerful graphics. A fast-paced action game that no one will want to put down.

title: School Hero
summary: Immerse yourself in this nostalgic yet modern blend of arcade-style action and anime storytelling, as Sakura high calls for a new Hero to rise in style. Will you answer the call and save the day?

title: QuickSwitch
summary: Fast Multiplayer 2D shooter, focusing on skills and timing. Vast variety of gamemodes, maps, weapons, skins. Fight for your ranking and glory !

title: Fizz Quiz
summary: FizzQuiz is a trivia game with over 100 topics and 10,000 questions. Play alone or with up to 10 friends in seven unique rounds, featuring questions in text, images, models, and audio formats.

title: Leyline Chronicles
summary:
Lambert, Devan, and Jaskya are Ley Sensitives, gifted people with supernatural abilities.
But what is the story behind these powers?

Join 8 different characters on a journey where they learn more about themselves,
their talents, and how they are part of a larger plan that will decide the fate of the
world of Orphania and beyond.

Leyline Chronicles is a classic JRPG and a tribute to the retro RPGs of the 90s.

title: CapitalismCraft
summary: Welcome to the wonderful world of capitalism! Exploit your workers to earn money! Hire managers to crush their spirits and drive them harder, then fire them once you’ve achieved your ends! Be agile, ruthless, merciless, become the richest CEO in the world, winning in rapid clicker management!

title: N3Rally
summary: 'N3Rally' combines a charming aesthetic with intense racing action. Drive a range of vehicles, from production cars to rally cars, and master various terrains such as tarmac, gravel, and snow!

title: Shelter from the Storm
summary: Rain lashes down soaking you to the bone, you take shelter in a seemingly abandoned house. Navigate through the rooms solving puzzles and trying to escape in this short point & click adventure game.

title: Quarrel Hill
summary: Single button - Push or slash. Anything to get them off the hill. Side effects might include sneezing, freezing, farting, poisoning, healing, or setting on fire.

title: Jump Man
summary: This is a challenging platform jumping game. You will play a strong adventurer, crossing monster infested plains, challenging dangerous mountains, and traversing icy fields. Explore in caves and laboratories.

title: Robinson Alchemy
summary: Robinson Alchemy is an alchemy game set on a deserted island where the objects you connect are the ones you first need to find and harvest.

title: Separium: 12th Elevator
summary: You are the Administrator of Separium. Complete AI Purry's mission to assess anomalies in the elevator and reach the Administrator's Office on the 12th floor.

title: Sweet Winter
summary: Sweet Winter - is a simple and beautiful puzzle game themed around winter, with relaxing music accompaniment. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girl's photos in the gallery.

title: Die by Anything
summary: Welcome to Die by Anything! Make the right choices to survive a “normal day” in the ordinary life of a student or die trying in ways you would never imagine. Trust nothing, no one and try to survive as you figure out what's going on.

title: Dungeon Vending Machines
summary: Dungeon Vending Machines is a relaxing, casual idle game. Where you run vending machines in a dungeon! As adventurers brave dangerous depths, you’ll be their lifeline. Expand your machine lineup, grow your profits, and become the ultimate dungeon supplier!

title: Boo! Are you scared? The Chests Game
summary: Boo! Are you scared? Don't be afraid, I'm a friend. Play the «Chests» card game for souvenirs with your new friend.

title: Survivor Story: The Apocalypse
summary: Your goal in this text-based choice game is to help the protagonist survive until he uncovers the mysteries surrounding the city in order to reunite with his daughter, Susan.

title: Trees and Jellyfish
summary: After a questionable decision, Coral gains the ability to talk to jellyfish. Isn't it just so convenient that there's seven of them in her class?

title: Farm Invader
summary: Pilot a UFO to abduct cows and humans in this retro arcade-style game! Boost your score while managing suspicion as humans roam the farm. Collect power-ups like score multipliers and time slowers to enhance your gameplay. Can you balance abductions and suspicion to achieve a high score?

title: Pod Jam
summary:
Pod Jam is a retro-inspired puzzle game where you guide alien pods to safe landings through strategic planning. Each level presents unique challenges with arrows that interact differently with the environment, requiring careful sequencing to prevent pods from getting stuck.

Offering 100 increasingly challenging levels, Pod Jam offers a blend of challenge and satisfaction. The ambient sci-fi soundtrack and minimalist retro visuals create an immersive experience. Easy to learn but hard to master, the game is a perfect title for logic puzzle and brain-teaser lovers.

title: Hullbreaker
summary: A fusion of arena PvP combat on the high seas and roguelite mechanics. Outfit your ship with powerful weapons, clash with rival captains on the high seas, and create your own flag to hoist over the shipwrecks!

title: Beyond The Tales
summary: A turn-based RPG about some friends that want to discover the meaning of their existence, but if they do, the world will end. This game will break the story to enter to a surreal aftergame experience.
A arcade game that combines a cozy atmosphere with maze exploration. Avoid the wasps, collect honey and get back to the beehive !!!

title: Nanoplanet Survivors
summary: "Nano Planet": A space exploration game where you use advanced tech to terraform an exoplanet, build farms and establish a colony. Similar to "Stardew Valley". Build relationships with aliens, uncovering planet's secrets. Pixel art, immersive story, unique blend of farming, adventure, and space.

title: Guardian's Guide
summary: A daughter raising sim/RPG

title: Clavis Kinkygate: Treasure of Danau River
summary: An addictive 2D side-scrolling adventure game with challenges and exciting erotic elements. Players take on the role of Ambrosio as he embarks on an adventure where he must confront the lust of Devil's Cove, defeat exciting bosses and have passionate interactions with a variety of characters.

title: Chemical Plant Worker Simulator
summary: Play as “牛大胆” in the “胆大牛化工厂”. You’re not the hero—just a worker on shift. But every chat, every task, carries a story.

title: Pirates of Justice
summary: Pirates of Justice is a strategic puzzle game where players help pirates destroy corrupt Marine buildings by placing objects to guide a bomb ball to its target. Use your wits to bring down the Marine's stronghold and rise through the pirate ranks.

title: Cain
summary: A downloadable game for Windows, Mac & Linux
